GK22vispancu:1240: ekaḥ kulīrako nānā-jala-cara-sametaḥ sametya tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ sādaram idam ūce-māma ! kim adya tvayā nāhāra-vṛttir anuṣṭhīyate ?

GK22vispancu:1244: tenāhaṃ samīpāgatān api matsyān na bhakṣayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1245: kulīrakas tac chrutvā prāha-māma, kiṃ tad vairāgya-kāraṇam ?
GK22vispancu:1246: sa prāha-vatsa, aham asmin sarasi jāto vṛddhiṃ gataś ca |
GK22vispancu:1247: tan mayaitac chrutaṃ yad dvādaśa-varṣikyānāvṛṣṭiḥ sampadyate lagnā |
GK22vispancu:1249: baka āha-daivajña-mukhād eṣa śanaiścaro hi rohiṇī-śakaṭaṃ bhittvā bhaumaṃ śakraṃ ca prayāsyati |
GK22vispancu:1251: yadi bhinte sūrya-suto rohiṇyāḥ śakaṭam iha loke |
GK22vispancu:1252: dvādaśa varṣāṇi tadā nahi varṣati vāsavau bhūmau ||Panc_1.233||
GK22vispancu:1254: prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvaiva pātakaṃ vasudhā |
GK22vispancu:1267: asmin śuṣke yaiḥ sahāhaṃ vṛddhiṃ gataḥ, sadaiva krīḍitaś ca, te sarve toyābhāvān nāśaṃ yāsyanti |
GK22vispancu:1268: tat teṣāṃ viyogaṃ draṣṭum aham asamarthaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1270: sāmprataṃ sarveṣāṃ svalpa-jalāśayānāṃ jalacarā guru-jalāśayeṣu sva-svajanair nīyante |
GK22vispancu:1272: atra punaḥ sarasi ye jalacarās te niścintāḥ santi,
GK22vispancu:1273: tenāhaṃ viśeṣād rodimi yad bīja-śesa-mātram apy atra noddhariṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1274: tataḥ sa tad ākarṇyānyeṣām api jalacarāṇāṃ tat tasya vacanaṃ nivedayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:1275: atha te sarve bhaya-trasta-manaso matsya-kacchapa-prabhṛtayas tam abhyupetya papracchuḥ-māma ! asti kaścid upāyo yenāsmākaṃ rakṣā bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:1276: baka āha-asty asya jalāśayasya nātidūre prabhūta-jala-sanāthaṃ saraḥ padminī-khaṇḍa-maṇḍitaṃ yac caturviṃśaty api varṣāṇām avṛṣṭyā na śoṣam eṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1277: tad yadi mama pṛṣṭhaṃ kaścid ārohati, tad ahaṃ taṃ tatra nayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1279: tāta mātula bhrātaḥ iti bruvāṇāḥ ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti samantāt paritasthuḥ |
GK22vispancu:1280_0: so 'pi duṣṭāśayaḥ krameṇa tān pṛṣṭha āropya jalāśayasya nātidūre śilāṃ samāsādya
GK22vispancu:1280_1: tasyām ākṣipya svecchayā bhakṣayitvā bhūyo 'pi jalāśayaṃ samāsādya jalacarṇāṇāṃ mithyā-vārtā-sandeśakair
GK22vispancu:1281: anyasmin dine ca kulīrakeṇoktaḥ-māma ! mayā saha te prathamaḥ sneha-sambhāṣaḥ sañjātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1282: tat kiṃ māṃ parityajyānyān nayasi ? tasmād adya me prāṇa-trāṇaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:1283: tad ākarṇya so 'pi duṣṭāśayaś cintitavān-nirviṇṇo 'haṃ matsya-māṃsādanena tad adyainaṃ kulīrakaṃ vyañjana-sthāne karomi |
GK22vispancu:1284: iti vicintya taṃ pṛṣṭe samāropya tāṃ vadhya-śilām uddiśya prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1285: kulīrako 'pi dūrād evāsthi-parvataṃ śilāśrayam avalokya mastyāsthīni parijñāya tam apṛcchat-māma,
GK22vispancu:1288: so 'pi manda-dhīr jalacaro 'yam iti matvā sthale na prabhavatīti sa-smitam idam āha-kulīraka,
GK22vispancu:1292: tvām apy anyāṃ śilāyāṃ nikṣipya bhakṣayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1293: ity uktavati tasmin sva-vadana-daṃśa-dvayena mṛṇāla-nāla-dhavalāyāṃ mṛdu-grīvāyāṃ gṛhīto mṛtaś ca |
GK22vispancu:1294: atha sa tāṃ baka-grīvāṃ samādāya śanaiḥ śanais taj jalāśayam āsasāda |
GK22vispancu:1295: tataḥ sarvair eva jalacaraiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoḥ kulīraka ! kiṃ nivṛttas tvam ? sa mātulo 'pi nāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1296: tat kiṃ cirayati ? vayaṃ sarve sotksukāḥ kṛta-kṣaṇās tiṣṭhāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1297: evaṃ tair abhihite kulīrako 'pi vihasyovāca-mūrkhāḥ ! sarve jalacarās tena mithyā-vādinā vañcayitvā nātidūre śilā-tale prakṣipya bhakṣitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1298: tan mamāyuḥ-śeṣatayā tasya viśvāsa-ghātakasyābhiprāyaṃ jñātvā grīveyam ānītā |
GK22vispancu:1302: vāyasa āha-bhadra ! tat kathaya kathaṃ sa duṣṭa-sarpo vadham upaiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1303: śṛgāla āha-gacchatu bhavān kañcin nagaraṃ rājādhiṣṭhānam |
GK22vispancu:1304: tatra kasyāpi dhanino rājāmātyādeḥ pramādinaḥ kanaka-sūtraṃ hāraṃ vā gṛhītvā tat-koṭare prakṣipa,
GK22vispancu:1306: tat-kṣaṇāt kākaḥ kākī ca tad ākarṇyātmecchayotpatitau |
GK22vispancu:1307: tataś ca kākī kiñcit saraḥ prāpya yāvat paśyati,
GK22vispancu:1308: tāvat tan-madhye kasyacid rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ jalāsannaṃ nyasta-kanaka-sūtraṃ mukta-muktāhāra-vastrābharaṇaṃ jala-krīḍāṃ kurute |
GK22vispancu:1309: atha sā vāyasī kanaka-sūtram ekam ādāya sva-gṛhābhimukhaṃ pratasthe |
GK22vispancu:1310: tataś ca kañcukino varṣa-varāś ca tan-nīyamānam upalakṣya gṛhīta-laguḍāḥ satvaram anuyayuḥ |
GK22vispancu:1311: kāky api sarpa-koṭare tat-kanaka-sūtraṃ prakṣipya sudūram avasthitā |
GK22vispancu:1312: atha yāvad rāja-puruṣās taṃ vṛkṣam āruhya tat-koṭaram avalokayanti,
GK22vispancu:1314: tatas taṃ laguḍa-prahāreṇa hatvā kanaka-sūtram ādāya yathābhilaṣitaṃ sthānaṃ gatāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1315: vāyasa-dampatī api tataḥ paraṃ sukhena vasataḥ |
GK22vispancu:1316: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-upāyena hi yat kuryāt iti |
GK22vispancu:1318: tan na kiṃcid iha buddhimatām asādhyam asti | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1319: yasya buddhir balaṃ tasya nirbuddhes tu kuto balam |
GK22vispancu:1325: kasmiṃścid vane bhāsurako nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:1326: athāsau vīryātirekān nityam evānekān mṛga-śaśakādīn vyāpādayan nopararāma |
GK22vispancu:1327: athānyedyus tad-vanajāḥ sarve sāraṅga-varāha-mahiṣa-śaśakādayo militvā tam abhyupetya procuḥ-svāmin ! kim anena sakala-mṛga-vadhena nityam eva,
GK22vispancu:1328: yatas tavaikenāpi mṛgeṇa tṛptir bhavati tat kriyatām asmābhiḥ saha samaya-dharmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1329: adya-prabhṛti tavātropaviṣṭasya jāti-krameṇa pratidinam eko mṛgo bhakṣaṇārthaṃ sameṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1330: evaṃ kṛte tava tāvat prāṇa-yātrā kleśaṃ vināpi bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1331: asmākaṃ ca punaḥ sarvocchedanaṃ na syāt |
GK22vispancu:1333: śanaiḥ śanaiś ca yo rājyam upabhuṅkte yathā-balam |
GK22vispancu:1334: rasāyanam iva prājñaḥ sa puṣṭiṃ paramāṃ vrajet ||Panc_1.238||
GK22vispancu:1340: pālanāt poṣaṇād grāhyaṃ nyāyyāṃ vṛttiṃ samācaret ||Panc_1.241||
GK22vispancu:1341: ajām iva prajāṃ mohād yo hanyāt pṛthivī-patim |
GK22vispancu:1342: tasyaikā jāyate tṛptir na dvitīyā kathañcana ||Panc_1.242||
GK22vispancu:1343: phalārthī nṛpatir lokān pālayed yatnam āsthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1346: āntara-sthair guṇaiḥ śubhrair lakṣyate naiva kenacit ||Panc_1.244||
GK22vispancu:1347: yathā gaur duhyate kāle pālyate ca tathā prajāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1350: phala-prado bhavet kāle tadval lokaḥ surakṣitaḥ ||Panc_1.246||
GK22vispancu:1352: tathānyad api yat kiñcit prajābhyaḥ syān mahīpateḥ ||Panc_1.247||
GK22vispancu:1354: lokānāṃ saṅkṣayāc caiva kṣayaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.248||
GK22vispancu:1355: atha teṣāṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya bhāsuraka āha-aho satyam abhihitaṃ bhavadbhiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1356: paraṃ yadi mamopaviṣṭasyātra nityam eva naikaḥ śvāpadaḥ samāgamiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1358: atha te tathaiva pratijñāya nirvṛti-bhājas tatraiva vane nirbhayāḥ paryaṭanti |
GK22vispancu:1364: teṣāṃ madhyāt tasya bhojanārthaṃ madhyāhna-samaya upatiṣṭhate |
GK22vispancu:1366: sa samasta-mṛgaiḥ prerito 'nicchann api mandaṃ mandaṃ gatvā tasya vadhopāyaṃ cintayan velātikramaṃ kṛtvāvyākulita-hṛdayo yāvad gacchati tāvan-mārge gacchatā kūpaḥ sandṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1367: yāvat kūpopari pāti tāvat kūpa-madhya ātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ dadarśa |
GK22vispancu:1368: dṛṣṭvā ca tena hṛdaye cintitam-yad bhāvya upāyo 'sti |
GK22vispancu:1369: ahaṃ bhāsurakaṃ prakopya sva-buddhyāsmin kūpe pātayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1371: siṃho 'pi velātikrameṇa kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhaḥ kopāviṣṭaḥ sṛkkaṇī parilelihad vyacintayat-aho ! pratār-āhārāya niḥsattvaṃ vanaṃ mayā kartavyam |
GK22vispancu:1372: evaṃ cintayatas tasya śaśako mandaṃ mandaṃ gatvā praṇamya tasyāgre sthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1373: atha taṃ prajvalitātmā bhāsurako bhartsayann āha-re śaśakādhama ekas tāvat tvaṃ laghuḥ prāpto 'parato velātikrameṇa |
GK22vispancu:1374: tad asmād aparādhāt tvāṃ nipātya prātaḥ sakalāny api mṛga-kulāny ucchedayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1375: atha śaśakaḥ sa-vinayaṃ provāca-svāmin ! nāparādho mama | na ca sattvānām | tac chyrūtāṃ kāraṇam |
GK22vispancu:1376: siṃha āha-satvaraṃ nivedaya yāvan mama daṃṣṭrāntargato na bhavān bhaviṣyati iti |
GK22vispancu:1378: samasta-mṛgair adya jāti-krameṇa mama laghutarasya prastāvaṃ vijñāya tato 'haṃ pañca-śaśakaiḥ samaṃ preṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1379: tataś cāham āgacchenn antarāle mahatā kenacid apareṇa siṃhena vivarān nirgatyābhihitaḥ-abhīṣṭa-devatāṃ smarata |
GK22vispancu:1380: tato mayābhihitam-vayaṃ svāminon bhāsuraka-siṃhasya sakāśam āhārārthaṃ samaya-dharmeṇa gacchāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1381: tatas tenābhihitam-yady evaṃ tarhi madīyam etad-vanam |
GK22vispancu:1382: mayā saha samaya-dharmeṇa samastair api śvāpadair vartitavyam |
GK22vispancu:1385: viśvāsa-sthāne caturaḥ śaśakān atra dhṛtvā tam āhūya drutataram āgaccha |
GK22vispancu:1386: yena yaḥ kaścid āvayor madhyāt parākrameṇa rājā bhaviṣyati sa sarvān etān bhakṣayiṣyati iti |
GK22vispancu:1391: yady evaṃ tat satvaraṃ darśaya me taṃ caura-siṃhaḥ yenāhaṃ mṛga-kopaṃ tasyopari kṣiptvā svastho bhavāmi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1392: bhūmir mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca vigrahasya phala-trayam |
GK22vispancu:1393: nāsty ekam api yady eṣāṃ na taṃ kuryāt kathañcana ||Panc_1.249||
GK22vispancu:1394: yatra na syāt phalaṃ bhūri yatra casyāt parābhavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1395: na tatra matimān yuddhaṃ samutpādya samācaret ||Panc_1.250||
GK22vispancu:1398: paraṃ sa durgāśrayaḥ durgān niṣkramya vayaṃ tena viṣkambhitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1399: tato durgastho duḥsadhyo bhavati ripuḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1400: na gajānāṃ sahasreṇa na ca lakṣeṇa vājinām |
GK22vispancu:1401: yat kṛtyaṃ sidhyati rājñāṃ durgeṇaikena vigrahe ||
GK22vispancu:1409: tenāpi ca varo datto yasya durgaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1410: vijayī syāt tato bhūmau durgāṇi syuḥ sahasraśaḥ ||
GK22vispancu:1413: sarveṣāṃ jāyate vaśyo durgahīnas tathā nṛpaḥ ||Panc_1.255||
GK22vispancu:1415: bhadra durgastham api darśaya taṃ caura-siṃhaṃ yena vyāpādayāmi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1416: jāta-mātraṃ na yaḥ śatruṃ rogaṃ ca praśamaṃ nayet |
GK22vispancu:1417: mahābalo 'pi tenaiva vṛddhiṃ prāpya sa hanyate ||Panc_1.256||
GK22vispancu:1419: uttiṣṭhamānas tu paro nopekṣyaḥ pathyam icchatā |
GK22vispancu:1420: samau hi śiṣṭair āmnātau vartsyantāv āmayaḥ sa ca ||Panc_1.257||
GK22vispancu:1422: upekṣitaḥ kṣīṇa-balo 'pi śatruḥ pramāda-doṣāt puruṣair madāndhaiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1426: ātmanaḥ śaktim udvīkṣya manotsāhaṃ ca yo vrajet |
GK22vispancu:1427: bahūn hanti sa eko 'pi kṣatriyān bhārgavo yathā ||Panc_1.259||
GK22vispancu:1430: tan na yujyate svāminas tasya tasya sāmarthyam aviditvā gantum | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1432: gacchann abhimukho vahnau nāśaṃ yāti pataṅgavat ||
GK22vispancu:1434: yo balāt pronnataṃ yāti nihantuṃ sabalo 'py arim |
GK22vispancu:1435: vimadaḥ sa nivarteta śīrṇa-danto gajo yathā ||Panc_1.261||
GK22vispancu:1436: bhāsuraka āha-bhoḥ kiṃ tavānena vyāpāreṇa | darśaya me taṃ durgastham api |
GK22vispancu:1437: atha śaśaka āha-yady evaṃ tarhy āgacchatu svāmī | evam uktvāgre vyavasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1438: tataś ca tenāgacchatā yaḥ kūpo dṛṣṭo 'bhūt tam eva kūpam āsādya bhāsurakam āha-svāmin kas te pratāpaṃ soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1439: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrato 'pi caura-siṃhaḥ praviṣṭaḥ svaṃ durgam |
GK22vispancu:1443: tataḥ so 'pi mūrkhaḥ siṃhaḥ kūpa-madhya ātma-pratibimbaṃ jala-madhya-gataṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃha-nādaṃ mumoca |
GK22vispancu:1444: tataḥ pratiśabdena kūpa-madhyād dvi-guṇataro nādaḥ samutthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1445: atha tena taṃ śatruṃ matvātmānaṃ tasyopari prakṣipya prāṇāḥ parityaktāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1446: śaśako 'pi hṛṣṭa-manāḥ sarva-mṛgān ānandya taiḥ saha praśasyamāno yathā-sukhaṃ tatra vane nivasati sma |
GK22vispancu:1447: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-yasya buddhir balaṃ tasya iti |
GK22vispancu:1449: tad yadi bhavān kathayati tat tatraiva gatvā tayoḥ sva-buddhi-prabhāveṇa maitrī-bhedaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:1450: karaṭaka āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tarhi gaccha |
GK22vispancu:1453: atha damanakaḥ sañjīvaka-viyuktaṃ piṅgalakam avalokya tatrāntare praṇamyāgre samupaviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1454: piṅgalako 'pi tam āha-bhadra, kiṃ cirād dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1455: damanaka āha-na kañcid deva-pādānām asmābhiḥ prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:1457: tathāpi rāja-prayojana-vināśam avalokya sandahyamāna-hṛdayo vyākulatayā svayam evābhyāgato vaktum | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1458: priyaṃ vā yadi vā dveṣyaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham |
GK22vispancu:1459: apṛṣṭo 'pi hitaṃ vakṣyed yasya necchet parābhavam ||Panc_1.262||
GK22vispancu:1460: atha tasya sābhiprāyaṃ vacanam ākarṇya piṅgalaka āha-kiṃ vaktu-manā bhavān ?
GK22vispancu:1462: sa prāha-deva sañjīvako yuṣmat-pādānām upari droha-buddhir iti |
GK22vispancu:1463: viśvāsa-gatasya mama vijane idam āha-bho damanaka ! dṛṣṭā mayāsya piṅgalakasya sārāsāratā |
GK22vispancu:1464: tad aham enaṃ hatvā sakala-mṛgādhipatyaṃ tvat-sācivya-padavī-samanvitaṃ kariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1465: piṅgalako 'pi tad-vajra-sāra-prahāra-sadṛśaṃ dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ samākarṇya moham upagato na kiñcid apy uktavān |
GK22vispancu:1466: damanako 'pi tasya tam ākāram ālokya cintitavān-ayaṃ tāvat sañjīvaka-nibaddha-rāgaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1467: tan nūnam anena mantriṇā rājā vināśam avāpsyati iti | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1468: ekaṃ bhūmi-patiḥ karoti sacivaṃ rājye pramāṇaṃ yadā taṃ mohāc chrayate madaḥ sa ca madād dāsyena nirvidyate |
GK22vispancu:1469: nirviṇṇasya padaṃ karoti hṛdaye tasya svatantra-spṛhā- svātantrya-spṛhayā tataḥ sa nṛpateḥ prāṇān abhidruhyati ||Panc_1.263||
GK22vispancu:1471: piṅgalako 'pi cetanāṃ samāsādya katham api tam āha-sañjīvakas tāvat prāṇa-samo bhṛtyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1473: damanaka āha-deva, bhṛtyo 'bhṛtya ity anekāntikam etat | uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:2236: athānya-dine siṃhena kadācid āsanna-prasavā prasava-vedanayā sva-yūthād bhraṣṭoṣṭry upaviṣṭā kasmiṃścid vana-gahane samāsāditā |
GK22vispancu:2237: atha tāṃ vyāpādya yāvad udaraṃ sphoṭayati, tāvaj jīvan laghu-dāseraka-śiśur niṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2238: siṃho 'pi dāserakyāḥ piśitena saparivāraḥ parāṃ tṛptim upāgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2239: paraṃ snehād bāla-dāsekaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛham ānīyedam uvāca-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2240: na te'sti mṛtyor bhayaṃ matto nānyasmād api |
GK22vispancu:2244: evam anuṣṭhite catvāro 'pi na eka-sthāne vihāriṇaḥ parasparam aneka-prakāra-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavantas tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:2245: śaṅkukarṇo 'pi yauvana-padavīm ārūḍhaḥ kṣaṇam api na taṃ siṃhaṃ muñcati |
GK22vispancu:2246: atha kadācid vajra-daṃṣṭrasya kenacid vanyena matta-gajena saha yuddham abhavat |
GK22vispancu:2247: tena mada-vīryāt sa danta-prahārais tathā kṣata-śarīro vihito yathā pracalituṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:2248: tadā kṣut-kṣāma-kaṇṭhas tān provāca-bhoḥ ! anviṣyatāṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ yenāham evaṃ sthito 'pi taṃ vyāpādyātmano yuṣmākaṃ ca kṣut-praṇāśaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:2249: tac chrutvā te trayo 'pi vane sandhyā-kālaṃ yāvad bhrāntāḥ, paraṃ na kiñcit sattvam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:2250: atha caturakaś cintayāmāsa-yadi śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ vyāpādyeta tataḥ sarveṣāṃ katicid dināni tṛptir bhavati |
GK22vispancu:2251: paraṃ nainaṃ svāmī mitratvād āśraya-samāśritatvāc ca vināśayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2252: athavā buddhi-prabhāveṇa svāminaṃ pratibodhya tathā kariṣye yathā vyāpādayiṣyati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2254: loke buddhimatām atra tasmāt tāṃ yojayāmy aham ||Panc_1.400||
GK22vispancu:2255: evaṃ vicintya śaṅkukarṇam idam āha-bhoḥ śaṅkukarṇa ! svāmī tāvat pathyaṃ vinā kṣudhayā paripīḍyate |
GK22vispancu:2256: svāmya-bhāvād asmākam api dhruvaṃ vināśa eva |
GK22vispancu:2257: tato vākyaṃ kiñcit svāmy-arthe vadiṣyāmi | tac chrūyatām |
GK22vispancu:2258: śaṅkukarṇa āha-bhoḥ śīghraṃ nivedyatāṃ, yena te vacanaṃ śīghraṃ nirvikalpaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:2259: aparaṃ svāminohite kṛte mayā sukṛta-śataṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2260: atha caturaka āha-bho bhadra ! ātma-śarīraṃ dviguṇa-lābhena svāmine prayaccha,
GK22vispancu:2263: tad ākarṇya śaṅkukarṇaḥ prāha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tan madīya-prayojanam etad ucyatām |
GK22vispancu:2267: tataś caturaka āha-deva ! na kiñcit sattvaṃ prāptam |
GK22vispancu:2269: tad yadi svāmī dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:2270: tataḥ śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ dviguṇa-vṛddhyā sva-śarīraṃ prayacchati dharma-pratibhuvā |
GK22vispancu:2271: siṃha āha-bhoḥ, yady evaṃ tat sundarataram | vyavahārasyāsya dharmaḥ pratibhūḥ kriyatām iti |
GK22vispancu:2272: atha siṃha-vacanānantaraṃ vṛka-śṛgālābhyāṃ vidāritobhaya-kukṣiḥ śaṅkukarṇaḥ pañcatvam upāgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2273: atha vajra-daṃṣṭraś caturakam āha-bhoś caturaka ! yāvad ahaṃ nadīṃ gatvā snānaṃ devatārcana-vidhiṃ kṛtvāgacchāmi,
GK22vispancu:2274: tāvat tvayātrāpamattena bhāvyam ity uktvā nadyāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2275: atha tasmin gate caturakaś cintayāmāsa-kathaṃ mamaikākino bhojyo 'yam uṣṭro bhaviṣyati iti vicintya kravyamukham āha-bhoḥ kravyamukha ! kṣudhālur bhavān |
GK22vispancu:2276: tad yāvad asau svāmī nāgacchati, tāvat tvam asyoṣṭrasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣaya |
GK22vispancu:2278: so 'pi tac chrutvā yāvat kiñcin māṃsam āsvādayati tāvac caturakeṇoktam-bhoḥ kravyamukha ! samāgacchati svāmī |
GK22vispancu:2279: tat tyaktvainaṃ dūre tiṣṭha, yenāsya bhakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpayati |
GK22vispancu:2280: tathānuṣṭhite siṃhaḥ samāyāto yāvad uṣṭraṃ paśyati tāvad riktīkṛta-hṛdayo dāserakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2281: tato bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā paruṣataram āha-aho kenaiṣa uṣṭra ucchiṣṭatāṃ nīto, yena tam api vyāpādayāmi |
GK22vispancu:2283: atha caturako vihasyovāca-bhoḥ ! mām anādṛtya piśitaṃ bhakṣayitvādhunā man-mukham avalokayasi |
GK22vispancu:2285: tad ākarṇya kravyamukho jīva-nāśa-bhayād dūra-deśaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2286: etasminn antare tena mārgeṇa dāseraka-sārtho bhārākrāntaḥ samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2288: tasyāḥ śabdaṃ durato 'py ākarṇya siṃho jambukam āha-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2289: jñāyatāṃ kim eṣa raudraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate'śruta-pūrvaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:2291: caturakaḥ kiñcid vanāntaraṃ gatvā satvaram abhyupetya provāca-svāmin ! gamyatāṃ gamyatāṃ yadi śaknoṣi gantum |
GK22vispancu:2292: so 'bravīt-bhadra, kim evaṃ māṃ vyākulayasi | tat kathaya kim etat ?
GK22vispancu:2293: iti caturaka āha-svāmin, eṣa dharmarājas tavopari kupitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2295: tat sahasra-guṇam uṣṭram asya sakāśād grahīṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:2296: iti niścitya bṛhan-mānam ādāyāgresarasyoṣṭrasya grīvāyāṃ ghaṇṭāṃ baddhvā badhya-dāseraka-saktān api pitṛ-pitāmahān ādāya vaira-niryātanārtham āyāta eva |
GK22vispancu:2297: siṃho 'pi tac chrutvā sarvato dūrād evāvalokya mṛtam uṣṭraṃ parityajya prāṇa-bhayāt praṇaṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2298: caturako 'pi śanaiḥ śanais tasyoṣṭrasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:2300: atha damanake gate sañjīvakaś cintayāmāsa-aho kim etan mayā kṛtam ?
GK22vispancu:2303: agamyāni pumān yāti yo 'sevyāṃś ca niṣevate |
GK22vispancu:2304: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā ||Panc_1.401||
GK22vispancu:2305: tat kiṃ karomi ? kva gacchāmi ? kathaṃ me śāntir bhaviṣyati ? athavā tam eva piṅgalakaṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:2307: prāṇair na viyojayati | yata uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2308: dharmārthaṃ yatatām apīha vipado devād yadi syuḥ kvacit
GK22vispancu:2309: tat tāsām upaśāntaye sumatibhiḥ kāryo viśeṣān nayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2310: loke khyātim upāgatātra sakale lokoktir eṣā yato
GK22vispancu:2311: dagdhānāṃ kila vahninā hita-karaḥ seko 'pi tasyodbhavaḥ ||Panc_1.402||
GK22vispancu:2316: yad bhāvi tad bhavati nātra vicāra-hetuḥ ||Panc_1.403||
GK22vispancu:2317: aparaṃ cānyatra gatasyāpi me kasyacid duṣṭa-sattvasya māṃsāśinaḥ sakāśān mṛtyur bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2322: mahato 'pi kṣayaṃ labdhvā ślāghyaṃ nīco 'pi gacchati |
GK22vispancu:2324: evaṃ niścitya sa sthalita-gatiṃ mandaṃ gatvā siṃhāśrayaṃ paśyann apaṭhat-aho, sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:2328: duḥkhena pravigāhyate sa-cakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam ||Panc_1.406||
GK22vispancu:2329: evaṃ paṭhan damanakoktākāraṃ piṅgalakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pracakitaḥ saṃvṛta-śarīro dūrataraṃ praṇāma-kṛtiṃ vināpy upaviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2330: piṅgalako 'pi tathāvidhaṃ taṃ vilokya damanaka-vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ kopāt tasyopari papāta |
GK22vispancu:2331: atha sañjīvakaḥ khara-nakha-vikartita-pṛṣṭhaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ tad-udaram ullikhya katham api tasmād apetaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ hantum icchan yuddhāyāvasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2332: atha dvāv api tau puṣpita-palāśa-pratimau paraspara-vadha-kāṅkṣiṇau dṛṣṭvā karaṭako damanakam āha-bho mūḍha-mate ! anayor virodhaṃ vitanvatā tvayā sādhu na kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:2335: kāryāṇy uttama-daṇḍa-sāhasa-phalāny āyāsa-sādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti nīti-kuśalāḥ sāmnaiva te mantriṇaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2336: niḥsārālpa-phalāni ye tv avidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍodyamais
GK22vispancu:2337: teṣāṃ durnaya-ceṣṭitair narapater āropyate śrīs tulām ||Panc_1.407||
GK22vispancu:2338: tad yadi svāmy-abhighāto bhaviṣyati tat kiṃ tavdīya-mantra-buddhyā kriyate |
GK22vispancu:2339: atha sañjīvako na badhyate tathāpy abhavyam |
GK22vispancu:2341: tan mūḍha ! kathaṃ tvaṃ mantri-padam abhilaṣasi |
GK22vispancu:2343: tad vṛthā manoratho 'yaṃ te daṇḍaruceḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2345: teṣāṃ daṇḍas tu pāpīyāṃs taṃ paścād viniyojayet ||Panc_1.408||
GK22vispancu:2347: sāmnaiva yatra siddhir na tatra daṇḍo budhena viniyojyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2348: pittaṃ yadi śarkarayā śāmyati ko 'rthaḥ paṭolena ||Panc_1.409||
GK22vispancu:2351: sāma-sādhyāni kāryāṇi vikriyāṃ yānti na kvacit ||Panc_1.410||
GK22vispancu:2352: na candreṇa na cāuṣadhyā na sūryeṇa na vahninā |
GK22vispancu:2354: tathā yat tvaṃ mantritvam abhilaṣasi, tad apy ayuktam |
GK22vispancu:2362: so 'yaṃ svāmy-amātyayor ekatamasya kiṃ vā dvayor api vinipātaḥ samutpadyate lagnaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2363: tad yadi kācic chaktir asti tad vicintyatāṃ vinipāta-pratīkāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:2365: tan mūrkha ! tat kartum asamarthatvaṃ yato viparīta-buddhir asi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2367: karmaṇi vyajyate prajñā susthe ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ ||Panc_1.412||
GK22vispancu:2369: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādhayitum |
GK22vispancu:2371: athavā na te doṣo 'yam | svāmino doṣaḥ | yas te vākyaṃ śraddadhāti | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2376: tad yadi tvam asya mantrī bhaviṣyasi tadānyo 'pi kaścin nāsya samīpe sādhu-janaḥ sameṣyati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2379: tathā ca śiṣṭa-jana-rahitasya svāmino 'pi nāśo bhaviṣyati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2381: ye ramante nṛpās teṣāṃ ramante ripavaḥ śriyā ||Panc_1.416||
GK22vispancu:2382: tat kiṃ mūrkhopadeśena | kevalaṃ doṣo na guṇaḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2383: nānāmyaṃ namate dāru nāśmani syāt kṣura-kriyā |
GK22vispancu:2390: tac ca kadācid dhemanta-samaye'tikaṭhora-vāta-saṃsparśa-vepamāna-kalevaraṃ tuṣāra-varṣoddhata-pravarṣa-ghana-dhārā-nipāta-samāhataṃ na kathañcic chāntim agamat |
GK22vispancu:2391: atha kecid vānarā vahni-kaṇa-sadṛśāni guñjā-phalāny avacitya vahni-vāñchayā phūtkurvantaḥ samantāt tasthuḥ |
GK22vispancu:2392: atha sucīmukho nāma pakṣī teṣāṃ taṃ vṛthāyāsamavalokya provāca-bhoḥ, sarve mūrkhā yūyam |
GK22vispancu:2396: tad anviṣyatāṃ kaścin nirvāto vana-pradeśo guhā giri-kandaraṃ vā |
GK22vispancu:2398: atha teṣām ekatamo vṛddha-vānaras tam uvāca-bho mūrkha ! kiṃ tāvad anena vyāpāreṇa |
GK22vispancu:2404: samālāpena yo yuṅkte sa gacchati parābhavam ||Panc_1.419||
GK22vispancu:2405: so 'pi tam anādṛtya bhūyo 'pi vānarān anavaratam āha-bhoḥ ! kiṃ vṛthā kleśena ?
GK22vispancu:2406: atha yāvad asau na kathañcit pralapan viramati tāvad ekena vānareṇa vyartha-śramatvāt kupitena pakṣābhyāṃ gṛhītvā śilāyām āsphālita uparataś ca |
GK22vispancu:2407: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-nānamyaṃ namate dāru ity ādi | tathā ca-
GK22vispancu:2408: upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ prakopāya na śāntaye |
GK22vispancu:2411: upadeśo na dātavyo yādṛśe tādṛśe nare |
GK22vispancu:2416: kasmiṃścid vane śamī-vṛkṣa-śākhālambita-vasathaṃ kṛtvāraṇya-caṭaka-dampatī prativasataḥ sma |
GK22vispancu:2417: atha kadācit tayoḥ sukha-saṃsthayor hemanta-megho mandaṃ mandaṃ varṣitum ārabdhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2418: atrāntare kaścic chākhā-mṛgo vātāsāra-samāhataḥ proddhūṣita-śarīro dantavīṇāṃ vādayan vepamānas tasyāḥ śamyā mūlam āsādyopaviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2419: atha taṃ tādṛṣam avalokya caṭakā prāha-bho bhadra !
GK22vispancu:2421: śītena bhidyase mūḍha kathaṃ na kuruṣe gṛham ||Panc_1.422||
GK22vispancu:2422: etac chrutvā tāṃ vānaraḥ sakopam āha-adhame kasmān na tvaṃ mauna-vratā bhavasi ?
GK22vispancu:2426: nāśaṅkate prajalpantī tat kim enāṃ na hanmy aham ||Panc_1.423||
GK22vispancu:2427: evaṃ pralapya tām āha-mugdhe ! kiṃ mama cintayā tava prayojanam ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2432: sa tāvat tāṃ śamīm āruhya tasyāḥ kulāyaṃ śatadhā khaṇḍaśo 'karot |
GK22vispancu:2434: tan mūrkha ! śikṣāpito 'pi na śikṣitas tvam |
GK22vispancu:2435: athavā na te doṣo 'sti, yataḥ sādhoḥ śikṣā guṇāya sampadyate, nāsādhoḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2436: kiṃ karoty eva pāṇḍityam asthāne viniyojitam |
GK22vispancu:2438: tad-vyartha-pāṇḍityam āśritya mama vacanam aśṛṇvann ātmanaḥ śāntim api vetsi |
GK22vispancu:2439: tan nūnam apajātas tvam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2440: jātaḥ putro 'nujātaś ca atijātas tathaiva ca |
GK22vispancu:2442: mātṛ-tulya-guṇo jātas tv anujātaḥ pituḥ samaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2444: apy ātmano vināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ para-vyasana-hṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2447: dharma-buddhiḥ kubuddhiś ca dvāv etau viditau mama |
GK22vispancu:2453: kasmiṃścid deśe dharmabuddhiḥ pāpabuddhiś ca dve mitre prativasataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2454: atha kadācit pāpabuddhinā cintitaṃ yad-ahaṃ tāvan mūrkho dāridryopetaś ca |
GK22vispancu:2455: tad enaṃ dharmabuddhim ādāya deśāntaraṃ gatvā asyāśrayeṇārthopārjanāṃ kṛtvainam api vañcayitvā sukhībhavāmi |
GK22vispancu:2456: athānyasminn ahani pāpabuddhir dharmabuddhiṃ prāha-bho mitra ! vārdhaka-bhāve kiṃ tv ātma-viceṣṭitaṃ smarasi |
GK22vispancu:2457: deśāntaram adṛṣṭvā kāṃ śiṣṭa-janasya vārttāṃ kathayiṣyasi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2459: bhramatā dharaṇī-pīṭhe tasya phalaṃ janmano vyartham ||Panc_1.430||
GK22vispancu:2461: vidyāṃ vittaṃ śilpaṃ tāvan nāpnoti mānavaḥ samyak |
GK22vispancu:2462: yāvad vrajati na bhūmau deśād deśāntaraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ ||Panc_1.431||
GK22vispancu:2463: atha tasya tad-vacanam ākarṇya prahṛṣṭa-manās tenaiva saha guru-janānujñātaḥ śubhe'hani deśāntaraṃ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2464: tatra ca dharmabuddhi-prabhāveṇa bhramatā pāpabuddhinā prabhūtataraṃ vittam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:2465: tataś ca tau dvāv api prabhūtopārjita-dravyau prahṛṣṭau sva-gṛhaṃ praty autsukyena prasthitau | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2468: atha sva-sthāna-samīpa-vartinā pāpabuddhinā dharmabuddhir abhihitaḥ-bhadra ! na sarvam etad dhanaṃ gṛhaṃ prati netuṃ yujyate |
GK22vispancu:2470: tad atraiva vana-gahane kvāpi bhūmau nikṣipya kiñcin mātram ādāya gṛhaṃ praviśāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2471: bhūyo 'pi prayojane sañjāte tan-mātraṃ sametyāsmāt sthānān neṣyāvaḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2472: na vittaṃ darśayet prājñaḥ kasyacit svalpam apy aho |
GK22vispancu:2473: muner api yatas tasya darśanāc calate manaḥ ||Panc_1.433||
GK22vispancu:2475: yathāmiṣaṃ jale matsyair bhakṣyate śvāpadair bhuvi |
GK22vispancu:2476: ākāśe pakṣibhiś caiva tathā sarvatra vittavān ||Panc_1.434||
GK22vispancu:2477: tad ākarṇya dharmabuddhir āha-bhadra evaṃ kriyatām |
GK22vispancu:2478: tathānuṣṭhite dvāv api tau sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sukhena saṃsthitavantau |
GK22vispancu:2479: athānyasminn ahani pāpabuddhir niśīthe'ṭavyāṃ gatvā tat sarvaṃ vittaṃ samādāya gartaṃ pūrayitvā sva-bhavanaṃ jagāma |
GK22vispancu:2480: athānyedyur dharmabuddhiṃ sametya provāca-sakhe bahu-kuṭumbā vayaṃ vittābhāvāt sīdāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2481: tad gatvā tatra sthāne kiṃcin mātraṃ dhanam ānayāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2483: atha dvāv api gatvā tat sthānaṃ yāvat khanatas tāvad riktaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭavantau |
GK22vispancu:2484: atrāntare pāpabuddhiḥ śiras tāḍayan provāca-bho dharmabuddhe ! tvayā hṛtam etad dhanaṃ, nānyena |
GK22vispancu:2488: sa āha-bho durātman ! mā maivaṃ vada |
GK22vispancu:2493: evaṃ dvāv api vivadamānau dharmādhikāriṇaṃ gatau ? procatuś ca parasparaṃ dūṣayantau |
GK22vispancu:2494: atha dharmādhikaraṇādhiṣṭhita-puruṣair divyārthaṃ yāvan niyojitau tāvat pāpabuddhir āha-
GK22vispancu:2495: aho na samyag-dṛṣṭo nyāyaḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2497: sākṣy abhāvāt tato divyaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ||Panc_1.436||
GK22vispancu:2498: tad atra viṣaye mama vṛkṣa-devatāḥ sākṣi-bhūtās tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:2499: tā apy āvayor ekataraṃ cauraṃ sādhuṃ vā kariṣyanti |
GK22vispancu:2500: atha taiḥ sarvair abhihitam-bho yuktam uktaṃ bhavatā | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2502: na tatra yujyate divyaṃ kiṃ punar vana-devatāḥ ||Panc_1.437||
GK22vispancu:2503: tad asmākam apy atra viṣaye mahat kautūhalam vartate |
GK22vispancu:2504: pratyūṣa-samaye yuvābhyām apy asmābhiḥ saha tatra vanoddeśe gantavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:2505: etasminn antare pāpabuddhiḥ sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-janakam uvāca-tāta,
GK22vispancu:2507: sa ca tava vacanena pariṇatiṃ gacchati |
GK22vispancu:2509: sa āha-vatsa, drutaṃ vada yena procya tad dravyaṃ sthiratāṃ nayāmi |
GK22vispancu:2513: tataḥ prabhāte yadāhaṃ satya-śrāvaṇaṃ karomi, tadā tvayā vācyaṃ yad dharmabuddhiś caura iti |
GK22vispancu:2514: tathānuṣṭhite pratyūṣe snātvā pāpabuddhiḥ dharmabuddhi-puraḥ-saro dharmādhikaraṇakaiḥ saha tāṃ śamīm abhyetya tāra-svareṇa provāca |
GK22vispancu:2516: dyaur bhūmir āpo hṛdayaṃ yamaś ca | ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca sandhye
GK22vispancu:2518: bhagavati vana-devate ! āvayor madhye yaś caura tat kathayata |
GK22vispancu:2519: atha pāpabuddhi-pitā śamī-koṭara-sthaḥ provāca-bho, dharmabuddhinā hṛtam etad dhanam |
GK22vispancu:2520_0: tad ākarṇya sarve te rāja-puruṣā vismayotphulla-locanā yāvad dharmabuddher vitta-haraṇocitaṃ
GK22vispancu:2520_1: nigrahaṃ śāstra-dṛṣṭyāvalokayanti tāvad dharmabuddhinā tac chamī-koṭaraṃ vahni-bhojya-dravyaiḥ
GK22vispancu:2521: atha jvalati tasmin śamī-koṭare'rdha-dagdha-śarīraḥ sphuṭitekṣaṇaḥ karuṇaṃ paridevayan pāpabuddhi-pitā niścakrāma |
GK22vispancu:2522: tataś ca taiḥ sarvaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bho kim idam ?
GK22vispancu:2523: ity ukte idaṃ sarvaṃ kukṛtyaṃ pāpabuddheḥ kāraṇāj jātam ity uktvā mṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2524: tatas te rāja-puruṣāḥ pāpabuddhiṃ śamī-śākhāyāṃ pratilambya dharmabuddhiṃ praśaṃsyedam ūcuḥ-
GK22vispancu:2526: upāyaṃ cintayet prājñas tathāpāyam api cintayet |
GK22vispancu:2534: sa ca baka-bālakān ajāta-pakṣān api sadaiva bhakṣayan kālaṃ nayati |
GK22vispancu:2535: athaiko bakas tena bhakṣitāny apatyāni dṛṣṭvā śiśu-vairāgyāt saras-tīram āsādya bāṣpa-pūraita-nayano 'dho-mukhas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:2536: taṃ ca tādṛk-ceṣṭitam avalokya kulīrakaḥ provāca-māma kim evaṃ rudyate bhavatādya ?
GK22vispancu:2537: sa āha-bhadra kiṃ karomi ? mama manda-bhāgyasya bālakāḥ koṭara-nivāsinā sarpeṇa bhakṣitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2539: tat kathaya me yady asti kaścid upāyas tad-vināśāya |
GK22vispancu:2540: tad ākarṇya kulīrakaś cintayāmāsa-ayaṃ tāvad asmat-sahaja-vairī |
GK22vispancu:2541: tathopadeśaṃ prayacchāmi satyānṛtaṃ yathānye'pi bakāḥ sarve saṅkṣayam āyānti | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2542: navanīta-samāṃ vāṇīṃ kṛtvā cittaṃ tu nirdayam |
GK22vispancu:2543: tathā prabodhyate śatruḥ sānvayo mriyate yathā ||Panc_1.440||
GK22vispancu:2545: yady evaṃ tan matsya-māṃsa-khaṇḍāni nakulasya bila-dvārāt sarpa-koṭaraṃ yāvat prakṣipa yathā nakulas tan-mārgeṇa gatvā taṃ duṣṭa-sarpaṃ vināśayati |
GK22vispancu:2546: atha tathānuṣṭhite matsya-māṃsānusāriṇā nakulena taṃ kṛṣṇa-sarpaṃ nihatya te'pi tad-vṛkṣāśrayāḥ sarve bakāś ca śanaiḥ śanair bhakṣitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2548: evaṃ mūḍha ! tvayāpy apāyaś cintito nopāyaḥ pāpa-buddhivat |
GK22vispancu:2552: prakaṭīkṛtaṃ tvayā svayam evātmano duṣṭatvaṃ kauṭilyaṃ ca |
GK22vispancu:2554: yatnād api kaḥ paśyec chikhinām āhāra-niḥsaraṇa-mārgam |
GK22vispancu:2555: yadi jalada-dhvani-muditās ta eva mūḍhā na nṛtyeyuḥ ||Panc_1.441||
GK22vispancu:2556: yadi tvaṃ svāminam enāṃ daśāṃ nayasi tad asmad-vidhasya kā gaṇanā ?
GK22vispancu:2557: tasmān mamāsannena bhavatā na bhāvyam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2559: rājaṃs tatra harec chyeno bālakaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.442||
GK22vispancu:2564: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne jīrṇadhano nāma vaṇik-putraḥ |
GK22vispancu:2566: yatra deśe atha vā sthāne bhogān bhuktvā svavīryataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2567: tasmin vibhavahīno yo vaset sa puruṣādhamaḥ ||Panc_1.443||
GK22vispancu:2570: dīnaṃ vadati tatraiva yaḥ pareṣāṃ sa ninditaḥ ||Panc_1.444||
GK22vispancu:2571: tasya ca gṛhe sahasra-loha-bhāra-ghaṭitā pūrva-puruṣopārjitā tulāsīt |
GK22vispancu:2572: tāṃ ca kasyacid chreṣṭino gṛhe nikṣepa-bhūtāṃ kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2573: tataḥ suciraṃ kālaṃ deśāntaraṃ yathecchayā bhrāntvā punaḥ sva-puram āgatya taṃ śreṣṭhinam uvāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin ! dīyatāṃ me sā nikṣepa-tulā |
GK22vispancu:2574: sa āha-bho ! nāsti sā tvadīyā tulā | mūṣikair bhakṣitā |
GK22vispancu:2575: jīrṇadhana āha-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin ! nāsti doṣas te yadi mūṣikair bhakṣiteti |
GK22vispancu:2579: tat tvam ātmīyaṃ śiśum enaṃ dhanadeva-nāmānaṃ mayā saha snānopakaraṇa-hastaṃ preṣayeti |
GK22vispancu:2580: so 'pi caurya-bhayāt tasya śaṅkitaḥ sva-putram uvāca-vatsa,
GK22vispancu:2582: tad gamyatām anena sārdhaṃ snānopakaraṇam ādāyeti |
GK22vispancu:2584: na bhaktyā kasyacit ko 'pi priyaṃ prakurute naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:2585: muktvā bhayaṃ pralobhaṃ vā kārya-kāraṇam eva vā ||Panc_1.445||
GK22vispancu:2589: athāsau vaṇik-śiśuḥ snānopakaraṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭa-manās tenābhyāgatena saha prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2590: tathānuṣṭhite vaṇik snātvā taṃ śiśuṃ nadī-guhāyāṃ prakṣipya tad-dvāraṃ bṛhac-chilayācchādya satvaraṃ gṛham āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2591: pṛṣṭaś ca tena vaṇijā-bho 'bhyāgata tat kathyatāṃ kutra me śiśur yas tvayā saha nadīṃ gataḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:2592: sa āha-nadī-taṭāt sa śyenena hṛta iti |
GK22vispancu:2593: śreṣṭhy āha-mithyā-vādin ! kiṃ kvacic chyeno bālaṃ hartuṃ śaknoti ?
GK22vispancu:2594: tat samarpaya me sutam, anyathā rāja-kule nivedayiṣyāmīti |
GK22vispancu:2595: sa āha-bhoḥ satyavādin ! yathā śyeno bālaṃ na nayati tathā mūṣikā api loha-bhāra-ghaṭitāṃ tulāṃ na bhakṣayanti |
GK22vispancu:2596: tad arpaya me tulāṃ yadi dārakeṇa prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:2597: evaṃ vivadamānau dvāv api rāja-kulaṃ gatau |
GK22vispancu:2598: tatra śreṣṭhī tāra-svareṇa provāca-bho 'brahmaṇyam abrahmaṇyam | mama śiśur anena caureṇāpahṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2599: atha dharmādhikāriṇas tam ūcuḥ-bhoḥ samarpyatāṃ śreṣṭhi-sutaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2600: sa āha-kiṃ karomi ? paśyato me nadī-taṭāc chyenenāpahṛtaḥ śiśuḥ |
GK22vispancu:2601: tac chrutvā te procuḥ-bho na satyam abhihitaṃ bhavatā | kiṃ śyenaḥ śiśuṃ hartuṃ samartho bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:2604: rājaṃs tatra harec chyeno bālakaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.447||
GK22vispancu:2606: tataḥ śreṣṭhī sabhyānām agre sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ nivedayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:2607: tatas tair vihasya dvāv api tau parasparaṃ sambodhya tulā-śiśu-pradānena santoṣitau |
GK22vispancu:2610: tan mūrkha ! sañjīvaka-prasādam asahamānena tvayaitat kṛtam | aho sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:2612: dātāraṃ kṛpaṇā ṛjūn anṛjavo vitte sthitaṃ nirdhanāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2614: nānā-śāstra-vicakṣaṇaṃ ca puruṣaṃ nindanti mūrkhāḥ sadā ||Panc_1.448||
GK22vispancu:2618: tan mūrkha tvayā hitam apy ahitaṃ kṛtam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2619: paṇḍito 'pi varaṃ śatrur na mūrkho hita-kārakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2620: vānareṇa hato rājā viprāś cīreṇa rakṣitāḥ ||Panc_1.450||
GK22vispancu:2624: kasyacid rājño nityaṃ vānaro 'tibhakti-paro 'ṅga-sevako 'ntaḥ-pure apy apratiṣiddha-prasaro 'tiviśvāsa-sthānam abhūt |
GK22vispancu:2625: ekadā rājño nidrāṃ gatasya vānare vyajanaṃ nītvā vāyuṃ vidadhati rājño vakṣaḥ-sthalopari makṣikopaviṣṭā |
GK22vispancu:2626: vyajanena muhur muhur niṣidhyamānāpi punaḥ punas tatra evopaviśati |
GK22vispancu:2627: tatas tena svabhāva-capalena mūrkheṇa vānareṇa kruddhena satā tīkṣṇaṃ khaḍgam ādāya tasyā upari prahāro vihitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2628: tato makṣikoḍḍīya gatā, paraṃ tena śita-dhāreṇāsinā rājño vakṣo dvidhā jātaṃ rājā mṛtaś ca |
GK22vispancu:2629: tasmāc cirāyur icchatā nṛpeṇa mūrkho 'nucaro na rakṣaṇīyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2630: aparam ekasmin nagare ko 'pi vipro mahā-vidvān paraṃ pūrva-janma-yogena cauro vartate |
GK22vispancu:2631: tasmin pure'nya-deśād āgatāṃś caturo viprān bahūni vastūni vikrīṇato dṛṣṭvā cintitavān-aho kenopāyenaiṣāṃ dhanaṃ labhe |
GK22vispancu:2632: iti vicintya teṣāṃ puro 'nekāni śāstroktāni subhāṣitāni cātipriyāṇi madhurāṇi vacanāni jalpatā teṣāṃ manasi viśvāsam utpādya sevā kartum ārabdhā |
GK22vispancu:2634: asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati |
GK22vispancu:2635: dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ ||Panc_1.451||
GK22vispancu:2636: atha tasmin sevāṃ kurvati tair vipraiḥ sarva-vastūni vikrīya bahu-mūlyāni ratnāni krītāni |
GK22vispancu:2637: tatas tāni jaṅghā-madhye tat-samakṣaṃ prakṣipya sva-deśaṃ prati gantum udyamo vihitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2638: tataḥ sa dhūrta-vipras tān viprān gantum udyatān prekṣya cintā-vyākulita-manāḥ saṃjātaḥ-
GK22vispancu:2639: aho dhanam etan na kiṃcin mama caṭitam |
GK22vispancu:2641: pathi kvāpi viṣaṃ dattvaitān nihatya sarva-ratnāni gṛhṇāmi |
GK22vispancu:2642: iti vicintya teṣām agre sa-karuṇaṃ vilapyedam āha-bho mitrāṇi ! yūyaṃ mām ekākinaṃ muktvā gantum udyatāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2643: tan me mano bhavadbhiḥ saha sneha-pāśena baddhaṃ bhavad-viraha-nāmnaivākulaṃ sañjātaṃ yathā dhṛtiṃ kvāpi na dhatte |
GK22vispancu:2644: yūyam anugrahaṃ vidhāya sahāya-bhūtaṃ mām api sahaiva nayata |
GK22vispancu:2645: tad-vacaḥ śrutvā te karuṇārdra-cittās tena samam eva sva-deśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2646: athādhvani teṣāṃ pañcānām api pallī-pura-madhye vrajatāṃ dhvāṅkṣāḥ kathayitum ārabdhāḥ-re re kirātāḥ ! dhāvata dhāvata |
GK22vispancu:2649: tataḥ kirātair dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam ākarṇya satvaraṃ gatvā te viprā laguḍa-prahārair jarjarī-kṛtya vastrāṇi mocayitvā vilokitāḥ,
GK22vispancu:2651: tadā taiḥ kirātair abhihitam-bhoḥ pānthāḥ ! purā kadāpi dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam anṛtaṃ nāsīt |
GK22vispancu:2652: tato bhavatāṃ saṃnidhau kvāpi dhanaṃ vidyate tad arpayata |
GK22vispancu:2653: anyathā sarveṣām api vadhaṃ vidhāya carma vidārya pratyaṅgaṃ prekṣya dhanaṃ neṣyāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2654: tadā teṣām īdṛśaṃ vacanam ākarṇya caura-vipreṇa manasi cintitam-yadaiṣāṃ viprāṇāṃ vadhaṃ vidhāyāṅgaṃ vilokya ratnāni neṣyanti,
GK22vispancu:2655: tadāpi māṃ vadhiṣyanti tato 'haṃ pūrvam evātmānam aratnaṃ samarpyaitān muñcāmi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2656: mṛtyor bibheṣi kiṃ bāla na sa bhītaṃ vimuñcati |
GK22vispancu:2657: adya vābda-śatānte vā mṛtyur vai prāṇināṃ dhruvaḥ ||Panc_1.452||
GK22vispancu:2659: gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca prāṇa-tyāgaṃ karoti yaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2660: sūryasya maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||Panc_1.453||
GK22vispancu:2661: iti niścityābhihitaṃ-bhoḥ kirātāḥ ! yady evaṃ tato māṃ pūrvaṃ nihatya vilokayata |
GK22vispancu:2662: tatas tais tathānuṣṭhite taṃ dhana-rahitam avalokyāpare catvāro 'pi muktāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2665: athaivaṃ saṃvadatoḥ sañjīvakaḥ kṣaṇam ekaṃ pīṅgalakena saha yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tasya khara-nakhara-prahārābhihito gatāsur vasundharā-pīṭhe nipapāta |
GK22vispancu:2666: atha taṃ gatāsum avalokya piṅgalakas tad-guṇa-smaraṇārdra-hṛdayaḥ provāca-bhoḥ,
GK22vispancu:2667: ayuktaṃ mayā pāpena kṛtaṃ sañjīvakaṃ vyāpādayatā |
GK22vispancu:2668: yato viśvāsa-ghātād anyan nāsti pāpataraṃ karma | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2669: mitra-drohī kṛtaghnaś ca yaś ca viśvāsa-ghātakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2670: te narā narakaṃ yānti yāvac candra-divākarau ||Panc_1.454||
GK22vispancu:2673: no yuktam uktaṃ hy anayoḥ samatvaṃ
GK22vispancu:2675: tathā mayā sabhā-madhye sa sadaiva praśaṃsitaḥ | tat kiṃ kathayiṣyāmi teṣām agrataḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2676: ukto bhavati yaḥ pūrvaṃ guṇavān iti saṃsadi |
GK22vispancu:2678: evaṃ-vidhaṃ pralapantaṃ damanakaḥ sametya saharṣam idam āha-deva,
GK22vispancu:2679: kātaratamas tavaiṣa nyāyo yad droha-kāriṇaṃ śaṣpa-bhujaṃ hatvetthaṃ śocasi |
GK22vispancu:2680: tan naitad upapannaṃ bhūbhujām | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2681: pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro bhāryāthavā suhṛt |
GK22vispancu:2682: prāṇa-drohaṃ yadā gacched dhantavyo nāsti pātakam ||Panc_1.457||
GK22vispancu:2687: tyājyā amī yaś ca kṛtaṃ na vetti ||Panc_1.458||
GK22vispancu:2694: akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahān api na pūjyate |
GK22vispancu:2695: pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāga-ghātinam ||Panc_1.460||
GK22vispancu:2697: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase |
GK22vispancu:2699: evaṃ tena sambodhitaḥ piṅgalakaḥ sañjīvaka-śokaṃ tyaktvā damanaka-sācivyena rājyam akarot |
GK22vispancu:2706: athedam ārabhyate mitra-samprāptir nāma dvitīyaṃ tantram | yasyāyam ādyaḥ ślokaḥ-
GK22vispancu:2712: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram |
GK22vispancu:2713: tasya nātidūrastho mahocchrāyavān nānā-vihaṅgopabhukta-phalaḥ kīṭair āvṛta-koṭaraś chāyāśvāsita-pathika-jana-samūho nyagrodha-pādapo mahān | athavā yuktam-

GK22vispancu:2721: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkita-manā vyacintayat-yad ayaṃ durātmādya mamāśraya-vaṭa-pādapa-sammukho 'bhyeti |

GK22vispancu:2726: te taṇḍulā bhavadbhiḥ sarvair api kālakūṭa-sadṛśā draṣṭavyāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2727: evaṃ vadatas tasya sa lubdhakas tatra baṭa-tala āgatya jālaṃ prasārya sindu-vāra-sadṛśāṃs taṇḍulān prakṣipya nātidūraṃ gatvā nibhṛtaḥ sthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2728: atha ye pakṣiṇas tatra sthitās te laghu-patanaka-vākyārgalayā nivāritās tāṃs taṇḍulān hālāhālāṅkurān iva vīkṣamāṇā nibhṛtās tasthuḥ |

GK22vispancu:2745: vyasaneṣv eva sarveṣu yasya buddhir na hīyate |

GK22vispancu:2766: citragrīvo 'pi lubdhakam adarśanībhūtaṃ jñātvā tān uvāca-bhoḥ ! nivṛttaḥ sa durātmā lubdhakaḥ |

GK22vispancu:2777: na gajānāṃ sahasreṇa na ca lakṣeṇa vājinām |

GK22vispancu:2800: sa āha-bhoḥ, jānann api kiṃ pṛcchasi ? uktaṃ ca yataḥ-

GK22vispancu:4536: tvayā ca putra-śoka-duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ vismartavyam iti punar uktvā vivarāntar-gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:4537: brāhmaṇaś ca maṇiṃ gṛhītvā putra-buddhiṃ nindan sva-gṛham āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:4539: tad asmin hate'yatnād eva rājyam akaṇṭakaṃ bhavato bhavati |
GK22vispancu:4540: tasyaitad-vacanaṃ śrutvā krūrākṣaṃ papraccha-bhadra ! tvaṃ tu kiṃ manyase ?
GK22vispancu:4542: yat kāraṇaṃ śaraṇāgato na vadhyate suṣṭhu |
GK22vispancu:4544: śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:4545: pūjitaś ca yathā-nyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ ||Panc_3.134||
GK22vispancu:4552: naiva kaścit suhṛt tasya na sambandhī na bāndhavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4553: sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parityaktas tena raudreṇa karmaṇā ||Panc_3.136||
GK22vispancu:4556: udvejanīyā bhūtānāṃ vyālā iva bhavanti te ||Panc_3.137||
GK22vispancu:4557: sa pañjarakam ādāya pāśaṃ ca laguḍaṃ tathā |
GK22vispancu:4559: anyedyur bhramatas tasya vane kāpi kapotikā |
GK22vispancu:4560: jātā hasta-gatā tāṃ sa prākṣipat pañjcarāntare ||Panc_3.139||
GK22vispancu:4561: atha kṛṣṇā diśaḥ sarvā vanasthasyābhavan ghanaiḥ
GK22vispancu:4563: tataḥ sa trasta-hṛdayaḥ kampamāno muhur muhuḥ |
GK22vispancu:4566: prāpya vṛkṣaṃ vadaty evaṃ yo 'tra tiṣṭhati kaścana ||Panc_3.142||
GK22vispancu:4567: tasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaḥ sa paritrātu mām iti |
GK22vispancu:4569: atha tasya taroḥ skandhe kapotaḥ suciroṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4571: vāta-varṣo mahān āsīn na cāgacchati me priyā |
GK22vispancu:4572: tayā virahitaṃ hy etac chūnyam adya gṛhaṃ mama ||Panc_3.145||
GK22vispancu:4574: yasya syād īdṛśī bhāryā dhanyaḥ sa puruṣo bhuvi ||Panc_3.146||
GK22vispancu:4575: na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate |
GK22vispancu:4577: pañjara-sthā tataḥ śrutvā bhartur duḥkhānvitaṃ vacaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4578: kapotikā susantuṣṭā vākyaṃ cedam athāha sā ||Panc_3.148||
GK22vispancu:4579: na sā strīty abhimantavyā yasyāṃ bhartā na tuṣyati |
GK22vispancu:4580: tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarva-devatāḥ ||Panc_3.149||
GK22vispancu:4582: bhasmībhavatu sā nārī yasyāṃ bhartā na tuṣyati ||Panc_3.150||
GK22vispancu:4583: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ bhrātā mitaṃ sutaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4584: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet ||Panc_3.151||
GK22vispancu:4586: śṛṇuṣvāvahitaḥ kānta yat te vakṣyāmy ahaṃ hitam |
GK22vispancu:4587: prāṇair api tvayā nityaṃ saṃrakṣyaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ ||Panc_3.152||
GK22vispancu:4589: śītārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca pūjām asmai samācara ||Panc_3.153||
GK22vispancu:4591: yaḥ sāyam atithiṃ prāptaṃ yathā-śakti na pūjayet |
GK22vispancu:4593: mā cāsmai tvaṃ kṛthā dvaiṣaṃ baddhāneneti mat-priyā |
GK22vispancu:4601: bhadra susvāgataṃ te'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te |
GK22vispancu:4602: santāpaś ca na kartavyaḥ sva-gṛhe vartate bhavān ||Panc_3.159||
GK22vispancu:4604: kapota khalu śītaṃ me hima-trāṇaṃ vidhīyatām ||Panc_3.160||
GK22vispancu:4606: tataḥ śuṣkeṣu parṇeṣu tam āśu samadīpayat ||Panc_3.161||
GK22vispancu:4607: susandīptaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tam āha śaraṇāgatam |
GK22vispancu:4609: udgatena ca jīvāmo vayaṃ sarve vanaukasaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4610: na cāsti vibhavaḥ kaścin nāśaye yena te kṣudham ||Panc_3.163||
GK22vispancu:4613: ekasyāpy atither annaṃ yaḥ pradātuṃ na śaktimān |
GK22vispancu:4615: tat tathā sādhayāmy etac charīraṃ duḥkha-jīvitam |
GK22vispancu:4616: yathā bhūyo na vakṣyāmi nāstīty arthi-samāgame ||Panc_3.166||
GK22vispancu:4617: sa ninindi kilātmānaṃ na tu taṃ lubdhakaṃ punaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4621: tatas taṃ lubdhako dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā pīḍito bhṛśam |
GK22vispancu:4622: kapotam agnau patitaṃ vākyam etad abhāṣata ||Panc_3.169||
GK22vispancu:4623: yaḥ karoti naraḥ pāpaṃ na tasyātmā dhruvaṃ priyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4624: ātmanā hi kṛtaṃ pāpam ātmanaiva hi bhujyate ||Panc_3.170||
GK22vispancu:4630: toyaṃ svalpaṃ yathā grīṣmaḥ śoṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ||Panc_3.173||
GK22vispancu:4634: tato yaṣṭiṃ śalākāṃ ca jālakaṃ pañjaraṃ tathā |
GK22vispancu:4635: babhañja lubdhako dīnāṃ kāpotīṃ ca mumoca tām ||Panc_3.175||
GK22vispancu:4636: lubdhakena tato muktā dṛṣṭvāgnau patitaṃ patim |
GK22vispancu:4638: na kāryam adya me nātha jīvitena tvayā vinā |
GK22vispancu:4639: dīnāyāḥ pati-hīnāyāḥ kiṃ nāryā jīvite phalam ||Panc_3.177||
GK22vispancu:4640: māno darpas tv ahaṅkāraḥ kulaṃ pūjā ca bandhuṣu |
GK22vispancu:4643: pativratā susandīptaṃ tam evāgniṃ viveśa sā ||Panc_3.179||
GK22vispancu:4645: bhartāraṃ sā vimānasthaṃ dadarśa svaṃ kapotikā ||Panc_3.180||
GK22vispancu:4646: so 'pi divya-tanur bhūtvā yathārtham idam abravīt |
GK22vispancu:4647: aho mām anugacchantyā kṛtaṃ sādhu śubhe tvayā ||Panc_3.181||
GK22vispancu:4648: tisraḥ koṭyo 'rdha-koṭī ca yāni romāṇi mānuṣe |
GK22vispancu:4649: tāvat kālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati ||Panc_3.182||
GK22vispancu:4652: harṣāviṣṭas tato vyādho viveśa ca vanaṃ dhanam |
GK22vispancu:4657: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-śrūyate hi kapotena (134) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:4658: tac chrutvārimardano dīptākṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān-evam avasthite kiṃ bhavān manyate ?
GK22vispancu:4661: priya-kāraka bhadraṃ te yan mamāsti harasva tat ||Panc_3.186||
GK22vispancu:4663: hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi hartavyaṃ ced bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:4665: arimardanaḥ pṛṣṭavān-kā ca nāvagūhate ? kaś cāyaṃ cauraḥ ? iti vistarataḥ śrotum icchāmi |
GK22vispancu:4669: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kāmāturo nāma vṛddha-vaṇik |
GK22vispancu:4670: tena ca kāmopahṛta-cetasā, mṛta-bhāryeṇa kācin nirdhana-vaṇik-sutā, prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattvodvāhitā |
GK22vispancu:4671: atha sā duḥkhābhibhūtā taṃ vṛddha-vaṇijaṃ draṣṭum api na śaśāka | yuktaṃ caitat-
GK22vispancu:4672: śvetaṃ padaṃ śirasi yat tu śiroruhāṇāṃ
GK22vispancu:4673: sthānaṃ paraṃ paribhavasya tad eva puṃsām |
GK22vispancu:4677: gātraṃ saṅkucitaṃ gatir vigalitā dantāś ca nāśaṅgatā
GK22vispancu:4678: dṛṣṭir bhrāmyati rūpam apy upahataṃ vaktraṃ ca lālāyate |
GK22vispancu:4679: vākyaṃ naiva karoti bāndhava-janaḥ patnī na śuśrūṣate
GK22vispancu:4681: atha kadācit sā tena sahaikaśayane parāṅmukhī yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad gṛhe cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4682: sāpi taṃ cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaya-vyākulitā vṛddham api taṃ patiṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliliṅga |
GK22vispancu:4683: so 'pi vismayāt pulakāñcita-sarva-gātraś cintayāmāsa-aho kim eṣā mām adyāvagūhate ?
GK22vispancu:4684: yāvan nipuṇatayā paśyati tāvat gṛha-koṇaika-deśe cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-nūnam eṣāsya bhayān mām āliṅgati iti jñātvā taṃ cauram āha-yā mamodvijate (186) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:4685: tac chrutvā cauro 'py āha-hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi (187) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:4686: tasmāc caurasyāpy upakāraḥ śreyaś cintyate kiṃ punaḥ śaraṇāgatasya |
GK22vispancu:4687: api cāyaṃ tair viprakṛto 'smākam eva puṣṭaye bhaviṣyati tadīya-randhra-darśanāya ceti anena kāraṇenāyam avadhya iti |
GK22vispancu:4688: etad ākarṇyārimardano 'nyaṃ sacivaṃ vakranāsaṃ papraccha-bhadra ! sāmpratam evaṃ sthite kiṃ karaṇīyam iti ?
GK22vispancu:4691: caureṇa jīvitaṃ dattaṃ rākṣasena tu go-yugam ||Panc_3.190||
GK22vispancu:4696: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne daridro droṇa-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ,
GK22vispancu:4700: tasya ca kenāpi yajamānenānukampayā śiśu-go-yugaṃ dattam |
GK22vispancu:4701: brāhmaṇena ca bāla-bhāvād ārabhya yācita-ghṛta-taila-yavasādibhiḥ saṃvardhya supuṣṭaṃ kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:4702: tac ca dṛṣṭvā sahasaiva kaścic cauraś cintitavān-aham asya brāhmaṇasya go-yugam idam apahariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:4704: yāvat prasthitas tāvad ardha-mārge pravirala-tīkṣṇa-danta-paṅktir unnata-nāsā-vaṃśaḥ,
GK22vispancu:4707: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ tīvra-bhaya-trasto cauro 'bravīt-ko bhavān ? iti |
GK22vispancu:4708: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ krūra-karmā cauro daridra-brāhmaṇasya go-yugaṃ hartuṃ prasthito 'smi |
GK22vispancu:4710: atas tam eva brāhmaṇam adya bhakṣayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:4711: atha tau tatra gatvaikānte kānlam anveṣayantau sthitau |
GK22vispancu:4712: prasupte ca brāhmaṇe tad-bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prasthitaṃ rākṣasaṃ dṛṣṭvā cauro 'bravīt-bhadra ! naiṣanyāyo yato go-yuge mayāpahṛte paścāt tvam enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhakṣaya |
GK22vispancu:4713: so 'bravīt-kadācid ayaṃ brāhmaṇo go-śabdena budhyeta tadānarthako 'yaṃ mamārambhaḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:4714: cauro 'py abravīt-tavāpi yadi bhakṣaṇāyopasthitasya eko 'py antarāyaḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:4715: tadāham api na śaknomi go-yugam apahartum |
GK22vispancu:4716: ataḥ prathamaṃ mayāpahṛte go-yuge paścāt tvayā brāhmaṇo bhakṣitavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4717: itthaṃ cāham ahamikayā tayor vivadatoḥ samutpanne dvaidhe pratirava-vaśād brāhmaṇo jajāgāra |
GK22vispancu:4718: atha taṃ cauro 'bravīt-brāhmaṇa ! tvām evāyaṃ rākṣaso bhakṣayitum icchati iti |
GK22vispancu:4719: rākṣaso 'py āha-brāhmaṇa ! cauro 'yaṃ go-yugaṃ te'pahartum icchati |
GK22vispancu:4720: evaṃ śrutvotthāya brāhmaṇaḥ sāvadhāno bhūtveṣṭa-devatā-mantra-dhyānenātmānaṃ rākṣasād udgūrṇa-laguḍena caurād go-yugaṃ rarakṣa |
GK22vispancu:4723: atha tasya vacanam avadhāryārimardanaḥ punar api prākārakarṇam apṛcchat-kathaya,
GK22vispancu:4726: yato rakṣitenānena kadācit paraspara-prītyā kālaḥ sukhena gacchati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4727: parasparasya marmāṇi ye na rakṣanti jantavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4733: asti kasmiṃścin nagare devaśaktir nāma rājā |
GK22vispancu:4734: tasya ca putro jaṭhara-valmīkāśrayeṇorageṇa pratidinaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ kṣīyate |
GK22vispancu:4735: anekopacāraiḥ sad-vaidyaiḥ sac-chāstropadiṣṭauṣadha-yuktyāpi cikitsyamāno na svāsthyam eti |
GK22vispancu:4737: kasmiṃścin nagare bhikṣāṭanaṃ kṛtvā mahati devālaye kālaṃ yāpayati |
GK22vispancu:4738: atha tatra nagare balir nāma rājāste |
GK22vispancu:4739: tasya ca dve duhitarau yauvana-sthe tiṣṭhataḥ |
GK22vispancu:4740: te ca pratidivasam ādityodaye pituḥ pādāntikam āgatya namaskāraṃ cakratuḥ |
GK22vispancu:4741: tatra caikābravīt-vijayasva mahārāja ! yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ sukhaṃ labhyate |
GK22vispancu:4742: dvitīyā tu-vihitaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja ! iti bravīti |
GK22vispancu:4743: tac chrutvā prakupito rājābravīt-bho mantriṇaḥ ! enāṃ duṣṭa-bhāṣiṇīṃ kumārikāṃ kasyacid vaideśikasya prayacchata tena nija-vihitam iyam eva bhuṅkte |
GK22vispancu:4744: atha tatheti pratipadyālpa-parivārā sā kumārikā mantribhis tasya deva-kulāśrita-rāja-putrasya pratipāditā |
GK22vispancu:4745: sāpi prahṛṣṭa-manasā taṃ patiṃ devavat pratipadyādāya cānya-viṣayaṃ gatā |
GK22vispancu:4746: tataḥ kasmiṃścid dūratara-nagara-pradeśe taḍāga-taṭe rāja-putram āvāsa-rakṣāyai nirūpya svayaṃ ca ghṛta-taila-lavaṇa-taṇḍulādi-kraya-nimittaṃ sa-parivārā gatā |
GK22vispancu:4747: kṛtvā ca kraya-vikrayaṃ yāvad āgacchati tāvat sa rāja-putro valmīkopari kṛta-mūrdhā prasuptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4748: tasya ca mukhād bhujagaḥ phaṇāṃ niṣkāsya vāyum aśnāti |
GK22vispancu:4749: tatraiva ca valmīke'paraḥ sarpo niṣkramya tathaivāsīt |
GK22vispancu:4750: atha tayoḥ paraspara-darśanena krodha-saṃrakta-locanayor madhyād valmīkasthena sarpeṇoktam-bho bho durātman ! kathaṃ sundara-sarvāṅgaṃ rāja-putram itthaṃ kadarthayasi ?
GK22vispancu:4751: mukhastho 'rir abravīt-bho bhoḥ ! tvayāpi durātmanāsya valmīkasya madhye katham idaṃ dūṣitaṃ hāṭaka-pūrṇaṃ kalaśa-yugalam ity evaṃ parasparasya marmāṇy udghāṭitavantau |
GK22vispancu:4752: punar valmīkastho 'hir abravīt-bho durātman ! bheṣajam idaṃ te kiṃ ko 'pi na jānāti yaj jīrṇotkālita-kāñjikā-rājikā-pānena bhavān vināśam upayāti |
GK22vispancu:4753: athodarastho 'hir abravīt-tavāpy etad bheṣajaṃ kiṃ kaścid api na vetti yad uṣṇa-tailena mahoṣṇodakena vā tava vināśaḥ syād iti |
GK22vispancu:4754: evaṃ ca sā rāja-kanyā viṭapāntaritā tayoḥ parasparālāpān marma-mayān ākarṇya tathaivānuṣṭhitavatī |
GK22vispancu:4755: vidhāya vyaṅgaṃ nīrogaṃ bhartāraṃ nidhiṃ ca paramam āsādya svadeśābhimukhaṃ prāyāt |
GK22vispancu:4759: tac ca śrutvā svayam arirdano 'py evaṃ samarthitavān |
GK22vispancu:4762: vināśito 'yaṃ bhavadbhir anyāyena svāmī | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4763: apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā |
GK22vispancu:4764: trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam ||Panc_3.192||
GK22vispancu:4766: pratyakṣe'pi kṛte pāpe mūrkhaḥ sāmnā praśāmyati |
GK22vispancu:4772: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vīravaro nāma rathakāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:4775: so 'pi tasyāḥ parīkṣaṇārthaṃ vyacintayat-atha mayāsyāḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ kartavyam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4776: yadi syāt pāvakaḥ śītaḥ proṣṇī vā śaśa-lāñchanaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4777: strīṇāṃ tadā satītvaṃ syād yadi syād durjano hitaḥ ||Panc_3.194||
GK22vispancu:4778: jānāmi caināṃ loka-vacanād asatīm | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4779: yac ca vedeṣu śāstreṣu na dṛṣṭaṃ na ca saṃśrutam |
GK22vispancu:4780: tat sarvaṃ vetti loko 'yaṃ yat syād brahmāṇḍa-madhyagam ||Panc_3.195||
GK22vispancu:4781: evaṃ sampradhārya bhāryām avocat-priye ! prabhāte'haṃ grāmāntaraṃ yāsyāmi |
GK22vispancu:4783: tat tvayā kim api pātheyaṃ mama yogyaṃ vidheyam |
GK22vispancu:4785: autsukyāt sarva-kāryāṇi santyajya siddham annaṃ ghṛta-śarkarā-prāyam akarot |
GK22vispancu:4789: athāsau pratyūṣe utthāya sva-gṛhān nirgataḥ sāpi taṃ prasthitaṃ vijñāya prahasita-vadanāṅga-saṃskāraṃ kurvāṇā kathañcit taṃ divasam atyavāhayat |
GK22vispancu:4790: atha pūrva-paricita-viṭa-gṛhe gatvā taṃ pratyuktavatī-sa durātmā me patir grāmāntaraṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:4792: tathānuṣṭhite sa rathakāro 'raṇye dinam ativāhya pradoṣe sva-gṛhe'padvāreṇa praviśya śayyādhas-tale nibhṛto bhūtvā sthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4793: etasminn antare sa devadattaḥ samāgatya tatra śayane upaviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:4794: dṛṣṭvā roṣāviṣṭa-citto rathakāro vyacintayat-kim enam utthāya hanmi ?
GK22vispancu:4795: athavā helayaiva prasuptau dvāv apy etau vyāpādayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:4798: atrāntare sā gṛha-dvāraṃ nibhṛtaṃ pidhāya śayana-talam ārūḍhā |
GK22vispancu:4800: tataḥ sā vyacintayat-nūnam etena durātmanā rathakāreṇa mat-parīkṣaṇārthaṃ bhāvyam |
GK22vispancu:4802: evaṃ tasyāś cintayanyā sa devadattaḥ sparśotsuko babhūva |
GK22vispancu:4803: atha tayā kṛtāñjali-puṭayābhihitaṃ-bhoḥ mahānubhāva ! na me śarīraṃ tvayā sparśanīyaṃ yato 'haṃ pativratā mahāsatī ca |
GK22vispancu:4804: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā tvāṃ bahsmasātkariṣyāmi |

GK22vispancu:4807: aham adya pratyūṣe devatā-darśanārthaṃ caṇḍkāyatanaṃ gatā tatrākasmāt khe vāṇī sañjātā-putri kiṃ karomi ?

GK22vispancu:4819_2: tvat-parīkṣā-nimittaṃ grāmāntara-vyājaṃ kṛtvā khaṭvādhas-tale nibhṛtaṃ līnaḥ |

GK22vispancu:4852: tasya ca sūryopasthānaṃ kurvatas tatra pradeśe mūṣikā kācit kharatara-nakhāgra-puṭena śyenena gṛhītā |
GK22vispancu:4853: dṛṣṭvā sa muniḥ karuṇārdra-hṛdayo muñca muñceti kurvāṇas tasyopari pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍaṃ prākṣipat |
GK22vispancu:4854: so 'pi pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍa-prahāra-vyākulendriyo bhraṣṭa-mūṣiko bhūmau nipapāta mūṣikāpi bhaya-trastā kartavyam ajānantī rakṣa rakṣeti jalpantī muni-caraṇāntikam upāviśat |

GK22vispancu:4859: iti bruvāṇaṃ śyenaṃ provāca saḥ-bho vihaṅgādhama ! rakṣaṇīyāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇāḥ |
GK22vispancu:4865: śyena āha-mune ! na tvaṃ sūkṣma-dharmaṃ vetsi |

GK22vispancu:4867: tato yathā bhavatām annaṃ tathāsmākaṃ mūṣikādayo vihitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:4868: tat svāhāra-kāṅkṣiṇaṃ māṃ kiṃ dūṣayasi ? uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:4870: abhakṣye bahu-doṣaḥ syāt tasmāt kāryo na vyatyayaḥ ||Panc_3.200||

GK22vispancu:4910: no ced anyo duṣṭa-pakṣī māṃ vyāpādayiṣyati |

GK22vispancu:4912: so 'pi dākṣiṇyavān sa-karuṇo vyacintayat-kathaṃ mayā mūṣikā haste dhṛtvā neyā jana-hāsya-kāriṇī |
GK22vispancu:4915: tathānuṣṭhite kanyā-sahitaṃ munim avalokya patnī papraccha-bhagavan ! kuta iyaṃ kanyā ?

GK22vispancu:4919: sā prāha-bhagavan ! maivaṃ kārṣīḥ | asyās tvaṃ dharma-pitā | uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:4922: tat tvayāsyāḥ prāṇa-pradattā | aparaṃ mamāpy apatyaṃ nāsti | tasmād eṣā mama sutā bhaviṣyati |

GK22vispancu:4926: anarhā sa sāmprataṃ mad-gṛha-vāsasya | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4927: anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā |

GK22vispancu:4929: varaṃ varayate kanyā mātā vittaṃ pitā śrutam |

GK22vispancu:4932: yāvan na lajjate kanyā yāvat krīḍati pāṃsunā |

GK22vispancu:4954: atha muninā megham apy āhūya kanyābhihitā-eṣa te rocate ?
GK22vispancu:4955: sā prāha-kṛṣṇa-varṇo 'yaṃ jaḍātmā ca | tad asmād anyasya kasyacit pradhānasya māṃ prayaccha |
GK22vispancu:4956: atha muninā megho 'pi pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoḥ ! tvatto 'py adhikaḥ ko 'py asti ?
GK22vispancu:4957: sa āha-matto 'py adhiko 'sti vāyuḥ | vāyunā hato 'haṃ sahasradhā yāmi |
GK22vispancu:4958: tac chrutvā muninā vāyur āhūtaḥ, āha ca-putrike kim eṣa vāyus te vivāhāya uttamaḥ pratibhāti ?
GK22vispancu:4959: sā āha-prabalo 'py ayaṃ cañcalaḥ | tad abhyadhikaḥ kaścid āhūyatām |
GK22vispancu:4960: munir āha-bho vāyo ! tvatto 'py adhiko 'sti kaścit ?

GK22vispancu:4962: atha muniḥ parvatam āhūya kanyāyā adarśayat-putrike ! tvām asmai prayacchāmi ?

GK22vispancu:4967: sāpi taṃ dṛṣṭvā sva-jātīya eṣa iti manyamānā pulakodbhūṣita-śarīrā provāca-tāta ! māṃ mūṣikāṃ kṛtvāsmai prayaccha yena svajāti-vihitaṃ gṛha-dharmam anutiṣṭhāmi |
