GK22vispancu:5253: niḥsarpe baddha-sarpe vā bhavane suṣyate sukham |
GK22vispancu:5254: sadā dṛṣṭa-bhujaṅge tu nidrā duḥkhena labhyate ||Panc_3.252||
GK22vispancu:5261: tad idam adhunā nihata-kaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ prajā-pālana-tatparo bhūtvā putra-pautrādi-krameṇācala-cchatrāsana-śrīḥ ciraṃ bhuṅkṣva | api ca-
GK22vispancu:5262: prajā na rañjayed yas tu rājā rakṣādibhir guṇaiḥ |
GK22vispancu:5268: na ca tvayā prāpta-rājyo 'ham iti matvā śrī-madenātmā vyasayitavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5269: yat kāraṇam-calā hi rājño vibhūtayaḥ vaṃśārohaṇavad rājya-lakṣmī-durārohā,
GK22vispancu:5286: na ca kaścid anadhigamanīyo nāmāsty āpadām | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5287: rāmasya vrajanaṃ vane nivasanaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ vane
GK22vispancu:5288: vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ nalasya nṛpate rājyāt paribhraṃśanam |
GK22vispancu:5290: sarve kāla-vaśāj jano 'tra sahate kaḥ kaṃ paritrāyate ||Panc_3.257||
GK22vispancu:5291: kva sa daśarathaḥ svarge bhūtvā mahendra-suhṛd gataḥ
GK22vispancu:5292: kva sa jalanidher velāṃ baddhvā nṛpaḥ sagaras tathā |
GK22vispancu:5293: kva sa karatalāj jāto vainyaḥ kva sūrya-tanur manuḥ
GK22vispancu:5295: māndhātā kva gatas triloka-vijayī rājā kva satyavrataḥ
GK22vispancu:5296: devānāṃ nṛpatir gataḥ kva nahuṣaḥ sac-chāstravān keśavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5298: kālenaiva mahātmanā tv anukṛtāḥ kālena nirvāsitāḥ ||Panc_3.259||
GK22vispancu:5300: sa ca nṛpatis te sacivās tāḥ pramadās tāni kānana-vanāni |
GK22vispancu:5301: sa ca te ca tāś ca tāni ca kṛtānta-dṛṣṭāni naṣṭāni ||Panc_3.260||
GK22vispancu:5302: evaṃ matta-kari-karṇa-cañcalāṃ rājya-lakṣmīm avāpya nyāyaika-niṣṭho bhūtvopabhuṅkṣva |
GK22vispancu:5309: athedam ārabhate labdha-praṇāśaṃ nāma caturthaṃ tantram | yasyāyam ādimaḥ ślokaḥ-
GK22vispancu:5310: samutpanneṣu kāryeṣu buddhir yasya na hīyate |
GK22vispancu:5311: sa eva durgaṃ tarati jalastho vānaro yathā ||Panc_4.1||
GK22vispancu:5315: asti kasmiṃścit samudropakaṇṭhe mahān jambū-pādapaḥ sadā-phalaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5316: tatra ca raktamukho nāma vānaraḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:5317: tatra ca tasya taror adhaḥ kadācit karālamukho nāma makaraḥ samudra-salilān niṣkramya sukomala-bālukā-sanāthe tīropānte nyaviśata |
GK22vispancu:5318: tataś ca raktamukhena sa proktaḥ-bhoḥ ! bhavān samabhyāgato 'tithiḥ |
GK22vispancu:5319: tad bhakṣayatu mayā dattāny amṛta-tulyāni jambū-phalāni | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5320: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyo mūrkho vā yadi paṇḍitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5322: na pṛcchec caraṇaṃ gotraṃ na ca vidyāṃ kulaṃ na ca |
GK22vispancu:5323: atithiṃ vaiśvadevānte śrāddhe ca manur abravīt ||Panc_4.3||
GK22vispancu:5325: atithiṃ pūjayed yas tu sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||Panc_4.4||
GK22vispancu:5327: gacchanti pitaras tasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ ||Panc_4.5||
GK22vispancu:5329: so 'pi tāni bhakṣayitvā tena saha ciraṃ goṣṭhī-sukham anubhūya bhūyo 'pi sva-bhavanam agāt |
GK22vispancu:5330: evaṃ nityam eva tau vānara-makarau jambū-cchāyā-sthitau vividha-śāstra-goṣṭhyā kālaṃ nayantau sukhena tiṣṭhataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5331: so 'pi makaro bhakṣita-śeṣāṇi jambū-phalāni gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-patnyai prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:5332: athānyatame divase tayā sa pṛṣṭaḥ-nātha ! kvaivaṃvidhāny amṛta-phalāni prāpnoṣi ?
GK22vispancu:5333: sa āha-bhadre ! mamāsti parama-suhṛd raktamukho nāma vānaraḥ |
GK22vispancu:5337: tad yadi bhāryayā te prayojanaṃ, tatas tasya hṛdayaṃ mahyaṃ prayaccha |
GK22vispancu:5338: yena tad bhakṣayitvā jarā-maraṇa-rahitā tvayā saha bhogān bhunajmi |
GK22vispancu:5344: ekaṃ prasūyate mātā dvitīyaṃ vāk prasūyate |
GK22vispancu:5345: vāg-jātam adhikaṃ procuḥ sodaryād api bāndhavāt ||Panc_4.6||
GK22vispancu:5346: atha makary āha-tvayā kadācid api mama vacanaṃ nānyathā kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:5347: tan nūnaṃ sā vānarī bhaviṣyati, yatas tasyā anurāgataḥ sakalam api dinaṃ tatra gamayasi |
GK22vispancu:5348: tat tvaṃ jñāto mayā samyak | yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:5349: sāhlādaṃ vacanaṃ prayacchati na me no vāñchitaṃ kiñcana
GK22vispancu:5350: prāyaḥ procchvasiṣi drutaṃ hutavaha-jvālā samaṃ rātriṣu |
GK22vispancu:5352: tat te dhūrta hṛdi sthitā priyatamā kācin mamevāparā ||Panc_4.7||
GK22vispancu:5353: so 'pi patnyāḥ pādopasaṅgrahaṃ kṛtvāṅkopari nidhāya tasyāḥ kopa-koṭim āpannāyāḥ sudīnam uvāca-
GK22vispancu:5355: tvaṃ prāṇa-vallabhe kasmāt kopane kopam eṣyasi ||Panc_4.8||
GK22vispancu:5361: aparaṃ sā yadi tava vallabhā na bhavati, tat kiṃ mayā bhaṇito 'pi tāṃ na vyāpādayasi |
GK22vispancu:5362: atha yadi sa vānaras tat kas tena saha tava snehaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5364: yadi tasya hṛdayaṃ na bhakṣayāmi, tan mayā prāyopaveśanaṃ kṛtaṃ viddhi |
GK22vispancu:5365: evaṃ tasyās tan niścayaṃ jñātvā cintā-vyākulita-hṛdayaḥ sa provāca-athavā sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:5367: eko grahas tu mīnānāṃ nīlī-madya-payos tathā ||Panc_4.10||
GK22vispancu:5368: tat kiṃ karomi ? kathaṃ sa me vadhyo bhavati |
GK22vispancu:5370: vānaro 'pi cirād āyāntaṃ taṃ sodvegam avalokya provāca-bho mitra ! kim adya cira-velāyāṃ samāyāto 'si ?
GK22vispancu:5373: sa āha-mitra ! ahaṃ tava bhrātṛ-jāyayā niṣṭhuratarair vākyair abhihitaḥ-bhoḥ kṛtaghna ! mā me tvaṃ svamukhaṃ darśaya,
GK22vispancu:5375: na ca tasya punaḥ pratyupakāraṃ gṛha-darśana-mātreṇāpi karoṣi |
GK22vispancu:5376: tat te prāyaścittam api nāsti | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5377: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca caure bhagna-vrate śaṭhe |
GK22vispancu:5378: niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ ||Panc_4.11||
GK22vispancu:5379: tat tvaṃ mama devaraṃ gṛhītvādya pratyupakārārthaṃ gṛham ānaya |
GK22vispancu:5380: no cet tvayā saha me para-loke darśanam iti |
GK22vispancu:5381: tad ahaṃ tayaivaṃ proktas tava sakāśam āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5382: tad adya tayā saha tvad-arthe kalahāyato mameyatī velā vilagnā |
GK22vispancu:5384: tava bhrātṛ-patnī racita-catuṣkā praguṇita-vastra-maṇi-māṇikyādy-ucitābharaṇā dvāra-deśa-baddha-vandana-mālā sotkaṇṭhā tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:5385: markaṭa āha-bho mitra ! yuktam abhihitaṃ mad-bhrātṛ-patnyā | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5387: ātmanaḥ sammukhaṃ nityaṃ ya ākarṣati lolupaḥ ||Panc_4.12||
GK22vispancu:5391: paraṃ vayaṃ vanacarāḥ yuṣmadīyaṃ ca jalānte gṛham |
GK22vispancu:5393: tasmāt tām api me bhrātṛ-patnīm atrānaya yena praṇamya tasyā āśīrvādaṃ gṛhṇāmi |
GK22vispancu:5394: sa āha-bho mitra ! asti samudrāntare suramye pulina-pradeśe'smad-gṛham æ tan mama pṛṣṭham ārūdhaḥ sukhenākṛta-bhayo gaccha |
GK22vispancu:5395: so 'pi tac chrutvā sānandam āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tat kiṃ vilambyate |
GK22vispancu:5398: tathānuṣṭhite'gādhe jaladhau gacchantaṃ marakam ālokya bhaya-trasta-manā vānaraḥ provāca-bhrātaḥ ! śanaiḥ śanair gamyatām |
GK22vispancu:5400: tad ākarṇya makaraś cintayāmāsa-asāv agādhaṃ jalaṃ prāpto me vaśaḥ sañjātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5401: mat-pṛṣṭha-gatas tila-mātram api calituṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:5402: tasmāt kathayāmy asya nijābhiprāyam, yenābhīṣṭa-devatā-smaraṇaṃ karoti |
GK22vispancu:5403: āha ca-mitra, tvaṃ mayā vadhāya samānīto bhāryā-vākyena viśvāsya |
GK22vispancu:5405: sa āha-bhrātaḥ ! kiṃ mayā tasyās tavāpi cāpakṛtaṃ yena me vadhopāyaś cintitaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5406: makara āha-bhoḥ ! tasyās tāvat tava hṛdayasyāmṛtamaya-phala-rasāsvādana-mṛṣṭasya bhakṣaṇe dohadaḥ sañjātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5408: pratyutpanna-matir vānara āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tat kiṃ tvayā mama tatraiva na vyāhṛtam ?
GK22vispancu:5409: yena sva-hṛdayaṃ jambū-koṭare sadaiva mayā suguptaṃ kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:5412: tad ākarṇya makaraḥ sānandam āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tad arpaya me hṛdayam |
GK22vispancu:5413: yena sā duṣṭa-patnī tad bhakṣayitvānaśanād utthiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:5414: ahaṃ tvāṃ tam eva jambū-pādapaṃ prāpayāmi |
GK22vispancu:5416: vānaro 'pi katham api jalpita-vividha-devatopacāra-pūjas tīram āsāditavān |
GK22vispancu:5417: tataś ca dīrghatara-caṅkramaṇena tam eva jambū-pādapam ārūḍhaś cintayāmāsa-aho ! labdhās tāvat prāṇāḥ |
GK22vispancu:5419: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste'pi na viśvaset |
GK22vispancu:5420: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati ||Panc_4.14||
GK22vispancu:5421: tan mamaitad adya punar janma-dinam iva sañjātam |
GK22vispancu:5422: iti cintayamānaṃ makara āha-bho mitra ! arpaya tad dhṛdayaṃ yathā te bhrātṛ-patnī bhakṣayitvānaśanād uttiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:5423: atha vihasya nirbhartsayan vānaras tam āha-dhig dhiṅ mūrkha viśvāsa-ghātaka ! kiṃ kasyacid dhṛdaya-dvayaṃ bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:5424: tad āśu gamyatāṃ jambū-vṛkṣasyādhastān na bhūyo 'pi tvayātrāgantavyam | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:5425: sakṛd duṣṭaṃ ca yo mitraṃ punaḥ sandhātum icchati |
GK22vispancu:5426: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā ||Panc_4.15||
GK22vispancu:5427: tac chrutvā makaraḥ saṃvilakṣaṃ cintitavān-aho ! mayātimūḍhena kim asya sva-cittābhiprāyo niveditaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5428: tad yady asau punar api kathañcid viśvāsaṃ gacchati, tad bhūyo 'pi viśvāsayāmi |
GK22vispancu:5429: āha ca-mitra ! hāsyena mayā te'bhiprāyo labdhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5430: tasyā na kiñcit tava hṛdayena prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:5432: vānara āha-bho duṣṭa ! gamyatām | adhunā nāham āgamiṣyāmi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5441: kasmiṃścit kūpe gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūka-rājaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:5442: sa kadācid dāyādair udvejito 'raghaṭṭa-ghaṭīm āruhya niṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5443: atha tena cintitam-yat kathaṃ tesāṃ dāyādānāṃ mayā pratyapakāraḥ kartavyaḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5444: āpadi yenāpakṛtaṃ yena ca hasitaṃ daśāsu viṣamāsu |
GK22vispancu:5445: apakṛtya tayor ubhayoḥ punar api jātaṃ naraṃ manye ||Panc_4.17||
GK22vispancu:5446: evaṃ cintayan bile praviśantaṃ kṛṣṇasarpam apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:5447: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'py acintayat-yad enaṃ tatra kūpe nītvā sakala-dāyādānām ucchedaṃ karomi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5449: sva-kāryāya yato na syāt kācit pīḍātra tat-kṣaye ||Panc_4.18||
GK22vispancu:5451: śatrum unmūlayet prājñas tīkṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇena śatruṇā |
GK22vispancu:5453: evaṃ sa vibhāvya bila-dvāraṃ gatvā tam āhūtavān-ehy ehi priya-darśana ! ehi !
GK22vispancu:5454: tac chrutvā sarpaś cintayāmāsa-ya evaṃ mām āhvayati |
GK22vispancu:5457: anyena kenāpi saha mama martya-loke sandhānaṃ nāsti |
GK22vispancu:5458: tad atraiva durge sthitas tāvad vedmi ko 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5459: yasya na jāyate śīlaṃ na kulaṃ na ca saṃśrayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5460: na tena saṅgatiṃ kuryād ity uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ ||Panc_4.20||
GK22vispancu:5461: kadācitko 'pi mantravādy auṣadha-caturo vā mām āhūya bandhane kṣipati |
GK22vispancu:5462: athavā kaścit puruṣo vairam āśritya kasyacid bhakṣaṇārthe mām āhvayati |
GK22vispancu:5464: sa āha-ahaṃ gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūkādhipatis tvat-sakāśe maitry-artham abhyāgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5465: tac chrutvā sarpa āha-bho ! aśraddheyam etat yat-tṛṇānāṃ vahninā saha saṅgamaḥ | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5466: yo yasya jāyate vadhyaḥ sa svapne'pi kathañcana |
GK22vispancu:5467: na tat-samīpam abhyeti tat kim evaṃ prajalpasi ||Panc_4.21||
GK22vispancu:5470: paraṃ para-paribhavāt prāpto 'haṃ te sakāśam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5471: sarva-nāśe ca sañjāte prāṇānām api saṃśaye |
GK22vispancu:5472: api śatruṃ praṇamyāpi rakṣet prāṇāndhanāni ca ||Panc_4.22||
GK22vispancu:5475: so 'py āha-kva te āśrayo vāpyāṃ kūpe taḍāge hrade vā | tat kathaya svāśrayam |
GK22vispancu:5482: yac chakyaṃ grasituṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat |
GK22vispancu:5483: hitaṃ ca pariṇāme yat tad ādyaṃ bhūtim icchatā ||Panc_4.23||
GK22vispancu:5485: ahaṃ sukhopāyena tatra tava praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5486: tathā tasya madhye jalopānte ramyataraṃ koṭaram asti |
GK22vispancu:5487: tatra sthitas tvaṃ līlayā dāyādān vyāpādayiṣyasi |
GK22vispancu:5488: tac chrutvā sarpo vyacintayat-ahaṃ tāvat pariṇata-vayāḥ |
GK22vispancu:5490: tat sukhāvaho jīvanopāyo 'yam anena kulāṅgāreṇa darśitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5491: tad gatvā tān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayāmi iti |
GK22vispancu:5494: sa hi sarva-sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim āracayed budhaḥ ||Panc_4.24||
GK22vispancu:5495: evaṃ vicintya tam āha-bho gaṅgadatta ! yady evaṃ tad-agre bhava | yena tatra gacchāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5496: gaṅgadatta āha-bhoḥ priyadarśana ! ahaṃ tvāṃ sukhopāyena tatra neṣyāmi,
GK22vispancu:5497: sthānaṃ ca darśayiṣyāmi ta eva bhakṣaṇīyāḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:5498: sarpa āha-sāmprataṃ tvaṃ me mitraṃ jātam |
GK22vispancu:5501: evam uktvā bilān niṣkramya tam āliṅgya ca tenaiva saha prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5502: atha kūpam āsādyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikā-mārgeṇa sarpas tenātmanā svālayaṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5504: tat sāmpratam anenaiva ghaṭikā-yantra-mārgeṇa gamyatām iti |
GK22vispancu:5505: sarpa āha-bho gaṅgadatta ! na samyag abhihitaṃ tvayā |
GK22vispancu:5506: katham ahaṃ tatra gacchāmi ? madīya-bila-durgam anyena ruddhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:5507: tasmād atra-sthasya me maṇḍūkam ekaikaṃ sva-vargīyaṃ prayaccha |
GK22vispancu:5508: no cet sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyāmi iti |
GK22vispancu:5509: tac chrutvā gaṅgadatto vyākula-manā vyācintayat-aho kim etan mayā kṛtaṃ sarpam ānayatā |
GK22vispancu:5510: tad yadi niṣedhayiṣyāmi tat sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:5513: sa karoti na sandehaḥ svayaṃ hi viṣa-bhakṣaṇam ||Panc_4.25||
GK22vispancu:5514: tat prayacchāmy asyaikaikaṃ pratidinaṃ suhṛdam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5524: ardhena kurute kāryaṃ sarva-nāśo hi dustaraḥ ||Panc_4.28||
GK22vispancu:5525: na svalpasya kṛte bhūri nāśayen matimān naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:5526: etad eva hi pāṇḍityaṃ yat svalpād bhūri-rakṣaṇam ||Panc_4.29||
GK22vispancu:5528: so 'pi taṃ bhakṣayitvā tasya parokṣe'nyān api bhakṣayati |
GK22vispancu:5530: yathā hi malinair vastrair yatra tatropaviśyate |
GK22vispancu:5531: evaṃ calita-vittas tu vitta-śeṣaṃ na rakṣati ||Panc_4.30||
GK22vispancu:5532: athānya-dine tenāparān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayitvā gaṅgadatta-suto yamunādatto bhakṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5533: taṃ bhakṣitaṃ matvā gaṅgadattas tāra-svareṇa dhig dhik pralāpa-paraḥ kathañcid api na virarāma |
GK22vispancu:5536: sva-pakṣasya kṣaye jāte ko nas trātā bhaviṣyati ||Panc_4.31||
GK22vispancu:5537: tad adyāpi vicintyatām ātmano niṣkramaṇam asya vadhopāyaś ca |
GK22vispancu:5538: atha gacchatā kālena sakalam api kavalitaṃ maṇḍūka-kulam |
GK22vispancu:5542: tad dīyatāṃ me kiñcid bhojanaṃ yato 'haṃ tvayātrānītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5543: sa āha-bho mitra ! na tvayātra viṣaye mayāvasthitena kāpi cintā kāryā |
GK22vispancu:5544: tad yadi māṃ preṣayati tato 'nya-kūpa-sthān api maṇḍūkān viśvāsyātrānayāmi |
GK22vispancu:5545: sa āha-mama tāvat tvam abhakṣyo bhrātṛ-sthāne |
GK22vispancu:5546: tad yady evaṃ karoṣi tat sāmprataṃ pitṛ-sthāne bhavasi |
GK22vispancu:5548: so 'pi tad ākarṇyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikām āśritya vividha-devatopakalpita-pūjopayācitas tat-kūpād viniṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5550: atha cirād anāgate gaṅgadatte priyadarśano 'nya-koṭara-nivāsinīṃ godhām uvāca-bhadre ! kriyatāṃ stokaṃ sāhāyyam |
GK22vispancu:5552: tad gatvā tat-sakāśaṃ kutracij jalāśaye'nviṣya mama sandeśaṃ kathaya |
GK22vispancu:5553: yenāgamyatām ekākināpi bhavatā drutataraṃ yady anye maṇḍūkā nāgacchanti |
GK22vispancu:5554: ahaṃ tvayā vinā nātra vastuṃ śaknomi |
GK22vispancu:5555: tathā yady ahaṃ tava viruddham ācarāmi tat sukṛtam antare mayā vidhṛtam |
GK22vispancu:5556: godhāpi tad-vacanād gaṅgadattaṃ drutataram anviṣyāha-bhadra gaṅgadatta ! sa tava suhṛt-priyadarśanas tava mārgaṃ samīkṣamāṇas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:5558: aparaṃ ca tena tava virūpa-karaṇe sukṛtam antare dhṛtam |
GK22vispancu:5567: tad bho duṣṭa-jalacara ! aham api gaṅgadatta iva tvad-gṛhe na kathañcid api yāsyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5568: tac chrutvā makara āha-bho mitra ! athavātrāham anaśanāt prāṇa-tyāgaṃ tavopari kariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5569: vānara āha-mūḍha ! kim ahaṃ lambakarṇo mūrkhaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5570: dṛṣṭvāpāyo 'pi svayam eva tatra gatvātmānaṃ vyāpādayāmi |
GK22vispancu:5571: āgataś ca gataś caiva gatvā yaḥ punar āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5573: makara āha-bhadra ! sa ko lambha-karṇaḥ | kathaṃ dṛṣṭāpāyo 'pi mṛtaḥ ? tan me nivedyatām |
GK22vispancu:5577: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe karāla-kesaro nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:5578: tasya ca dhūsarako nāma śṛgālaḥ sadaivānuyāyī paricārako 'sti |
GK22vispancu:5579: atha kadācit tasya hastinā saha yudhyamānasya śarīre gurutarāḥ prahārāḥ sañjātāḥ |
GK22vispancu:5580: yaiḥ padam ekam api calituṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:5581: tasyācalanāc ca dhūsarakaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho daurbalyaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5582: anyasminn ahani tam avocat-svāmin ! bubhukṣaya pīḍito 'ham |
GK22vispancu:5583: padāt padam api calituṃ na śaknomi |
GK22vispancu:5585: siṃha āha-bhoḥ ! gaccha anveṣaya kiñcit sattvam | yenemām avasthāṃ gato 'pi vyāpādayāmi |
GK22vispancu:5586: tad ākarṇya śṛgālo 'nveṣayan kañcit samīpa-vartinaṃ grāmam āsāditavān |
GK22vispancu:5587: tatra lambakarṇo nāma gardabhas taḍāgopānte pravirala-dūrvāṅkurān kṛcchrād āsvādayan dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5588: tataś ca samīpa-vartinā bhūtvā tenābhihitaḥ-māma ! namaskāro 'yaṃ madīyaḥ sambhāvyatām |
GK22vispancu:5590: tat kathaya kim evaṃ durbalatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5596: śṛgāla āha-māma ! yady evaṃ tad asti marakata-sadṛśa-śaṣpa-prāyo nadī-sanātho ramaṇīyataraḥ pradeśaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5597: tatrāgatya mayā saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavaṃs tiṣṭha |
GK22vispancu:5598: lambakarṇa āha-bho bhaginī-suta ! yuktam uktaṃ bhavatā |
GK22vispancu:5603: tatrāsti na kaścid aparasya tatra praveśaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5604: paramam anenaiva doṣeṇa rajaka-kadarthitās tatra tisro rāsabhyo 'nāthāḥ santi |
GK22vispancu:5605: tāś ca puṣṭim āpannā yauvanotkaṭā idaṃ mām ūcuḥ-yadi tvam asmākaṃ satyo mātulas tadā kaṃcid grāmāntaraṃ gatvāsmad-yogyaṃ kaścit patim ānaya |
GK22vispancu:5607: atha śṛgāla-vacanāni śrutvā kāma-pīḍitāṅgas tam avocat-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tad-agre bhava yenāgacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:5609: nāmṛtaṃ na viṣaṃ kiñcid ekāṃ muktvā nitambinīm |
GK22vispancu:5610: yasyāḥ saṅgena jīvyeta mriyate ca viyogataḥ ||Panc_4.34||
GK22vispancu:5612: yāsāṃ nāmnāpi kāmaḥ syāt saṅgamaṃ darśanaṃ vinā |
GK22vispancu:5613: tāsāṃ dṛk-saṅgamaṃ prāpya yan na dravati kautukam ||Panc_4.35||
GK22vispancu:5615: siṃho 'pi vyathākulitas taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāvat samuttiṣṭhati tāvad rāsabhaḥ palāyitum ārabdhavān |
GK22vispancu:5616: atha tasya palāyamānasya siṃhena tala-prahāro dattaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5617: sa ca manda-bhāgyasya vyavasāya iva vyarthatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5618: atrāntare śṛgālaḥ kopāviṣṭas tam uvāca-bhoḥ ! kim evaṃvidhaḥ prahāras te |
GK22vispancu:5619: yad gardabho 'pi tava purato balād gacchati |
GK22vispancu:5620: tat kathaṃ gajena saha yuddhaṃ kariṣyasi ? tad dṛṣṭaṃ te balam |
GK22vispancu:5621: atha savilakṣa-smitaṃ siṃha āha-bhoḥ ! kim ahaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:5624: śṛgāla āha-adyāpy eka-vāraṃ tavāntike tam āneṣyāmi | paraṃ tvayā sajjīkṛta-krameṇa sthātavyam |
GK22vispancu:5625: siṃha āha-bhadra ! yo māṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā gataḥ sa punaḥ katham atrāgamiṣyati ?
GK22vispancu:5626: tad anyat kim api sattvam anviṣyatām |
GK22vispancu:5627: śṛgāla āha-kiṃ tavānena vyāpāreṇa ? tvaṃ kevalaṃ sajjita-kramas tiṣṭha |
GK22vispancu:5628: tathānuṣṭhite śṛgālo 'pi yāvad rāsabha-mārgeṇa gacchati, tāvat tatraiva sthāne caran dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5629: atha śṛgālaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāsabhaḥ prāha-bho bhaginī-suta ! śobhana-sthāne tvayāhaṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5631: tat kathaya kiṃ tat sattvaṃ yasyātiraudra-vajra-sadṛśa-kara-prahārād ahaṃ muktaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5632: tac chrutvā prahasan śṛgāla āha-bhadra ! rāsabhī tvām āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā sānurāgam āliṅgituṃ samutthitā |
GK22vispancu:5634: sā punar na śaktā tvāṃ vinā sthātum |
GK22vispancu:5635: tayā tu naśatas te'valambanārthaṃ hastaḥ kṣiptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5639: etad vadati-yal lambakarṇo yadi me bhartā na bhavati tad aham agnau jalaṃ vā praviśāmi |
GK22vispancu:5640: punas tasya viyogaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknomi iti |
GK22vispancu:5643: aparaṃ bhagavān kāma-kopaṃ tavopari kariṣyati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5645: te mūḍhāḥ pravihāya yānti kudhiyo mithyā-phalānveṣiṇaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5646: te tenaiva nihatya nirdayataraṃ nagnīkṛtā muṇḍitāḥ
GK22vispancu:5647: kecid rakta-paṭīkṛtāś ca jaṭilāḥ kāpālikāś cāpare ||Panc_4.36||
GK22vispancu:5648: athāsau tad-vacanaṃ śraddheyatayā śrutvā bhūyo 'pi tena saha prasthitaḥ | athavā sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:5649: jānann api naro daivāt prakaroti vigarhitam |
GK22vispancu:5650: karma kiṃ kasyacil loke garhitaṃ rocate katham ||Panc_4.37||
GK22vispancu:5651: atrāntare sajjita-krameṇa siṃhena sa lambakarṇo vyāpāditaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5652: tatas taṃ hatvā śṛgālaṃ rakṣakaṃ nirūpya svayaṃ snānārthaṃ nadyāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5654: atrāntare siṃho yāvat snātvā kṛte devārcanaḥ pratarpita-pitṛ-gaṇaḥ samāyāti tāvat karṇa-hṛdaya-rahito rāsabhas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:5655: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kopa-parītātmā siṃhaḥ śṛgālam āha-pāpa ! kim idam anucitaṃ karma samācaritam ?
GK22vispancu:5657: śṛgālaḥ sa-vinayam āha-svāmin ! mā maivaṃ vada |
GK22vispancu:5658: yat karṇa-hṛdaya-rahito 'yaṃ rāsabha āsīt, tenehāgatya tvām avalokya bhūyo 'py āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5659: atha tvad-vacanaṃ śraddheyaṃ matvā siṃhas tenaiva saṃvibhajya niḥśaṅkita-manās taṃ bhakṣitavān |
GK22vispancu:5661: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-āgataś ca gataś caiva iti |
GK22vispancu:5665: svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī satyaṃ brūte sumanda-dhīḥ |
GK22vispancu:5666: sa svārthād bhraśyate nūnaṃ yudhiṣṭhira ivāparaḥ ||Panc_4.38||
GK22vispancu:5672: sa kadācit pramādād ardha-magna-kharpara-tīkṣṇāgrasyopari mahatā vegena dhāvan patitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5673: tataḥ khapara-koṭyā pāṭita-lalāī̀oo rudhira-plāvita-tanuḥ kṛcchrād utthāya svāśrayaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5674: tataś cāpathya-sevanāt sa prahāras tasya karālatāṃ gataḥ kṛcchreṇa nīrogatāṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5675: atha kadācid durbhikṣa-pīḍite deśe ca kumbhakāraḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhaḥ kaiścid rāja-sevakaiḥ saha deśāntaraṃ gatvā kasyāpi rājñaḥ sevako babhūva |
GK22vispancu:5676: so 'pi rājā tasya lalāṭe vikarālaṃ prahāra-kṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayāmāsa,
GK22vispancu:5679: atas taṃ samānādibhiḥ sarveṣāṃ rāja-putrāṇāṃ madhye viśeṣa-prasādena paśyati sma |
GK22vispancu:5680: te'pi rāja-putrās tasya taṃ prasādātirekaṃ paśyantaṃ paramerṣyā-dharmaṃ vahanto rāja-bhayān na kiñcid ūcuḥ |
GK22vispancu:5681: athānyasminn ahani tasya bhūpater vīra-sambhāvanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ vigrahe samupasthite prakalpyamāneṣu gajeṣu saṃnahyamāneṣu vājiṣu yodheṣu |
GK22vispancu:5682: praguṇīkriyamāṇeṣu tena bhūbhujā sa kumbhakāraḥ prastāvānugataṃ pṛṣṭo nirjane-bho rāja-putra ! kiṃ te nāma ?
GK22vispancu:5684: kasmin saṅgrāme prahāro 'yaṃ te lalāṭe lagnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5688: atha kadācin madya-pānaṃ kṛtvā nirgataḥ pradhāvan kharparopari patitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5689: tasya prahāra-vikāro 'yaṃ me lalāṭe evaṃ vikarālatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5690: tad ākarṇya rājā sa-vrīḍam āha-aho vañcito 'haṃ rājāputrānukāriṇānena kulālena |
GK22vispancu:5692: tathānuṣṭhite kumbhakāra āha-mā maivaṃ kuru | paśya me raṇe hasta-lāghavam |
GK22vispancu:5693: rājā prāha-sarva-guṇa-sampanno bhavān | tathāpi gamyatām | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5694: śūdraś ca kṛta-vighnaś ca darśanīyo 'si putraka |
GK22vispancu:5695: yasmin kule tvam utpanno gajas tatra na hanyate ||Panc_4.39||
GK22vispancu:5702: siṃho 'pi nityam eva mṛgān vyāpādya siṃhyai dadāti |
GK22vispancu:5703: athānyasmin ahani tena kim api nāsāditam |
GK22vispancu:5704: yena bhramato 'pi tasya ravir astaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5705: atha tena sva-gṛham āgacchatā śṛgāla-śiśuḥ prāptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5706: sa ca bālako 'yam ity avadhārya yatnena daṃṣṭrāmadhya-gataṃ kṛtvā siṃhyā jīvantam eva samarpitavān |
GK22vispancu:5707: tataḥ siṃhyābhihitam-bhoḥ kānta ! tvayānītaṃ kiñcid asmākaṃ bhojanam ?
GK22vispancu:5708: siṃha āha-priye ! mayādyainaṃ śṛgāla-śiśuṃ parityajya na kiñcit sattvam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:5709: sa ca mayā bālo 'yam iti matvā na vyāpādito viśeṣāt svajātīyaś ca | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5712: idānīṃ tvam enaṃ bhakṣayitvā pathyaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:5714: sā prāha-bhoḥ kānta ! tvayā bālako 'yam iti vicintya na hataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5715: tat katham enam ahaṃ svodarārthe vināśayāmi | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5717: na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ||Panc_4.41||
GK22vispancu:5719: ity evam uktvā tam api svastana-kṣīreṇa parāṃ puṣṭim anayat |
GK22vispancu:5720: evaṃ te trayo 'pi śiśavaḥ parasparam ajñāta-jāti-viśeṣā ekācāra-vihārā bālya-samayaṃ nirvāhayanti |
GK22vispancu:5721: atha kadācit tatra vane bhramann araṇya-gajaḥ samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5722: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau siṃha-sutau dvāv api kupitānanau taṃ prati pracalitau yāvat tāvat tena śṛgāla-sutenābhihitam-aho ! gajo 'yaṃ yuṣmat-kula-śatruḥ |
GK22vispancu:5728: sotsāhaṃ jāyate sainyaṃ bhagne bhaṅgam avāpnuyāt ||Panc_4.42||
GK22vispancu:5730: ata eva vāñchanti bhūpā yodhān mahābalān |
GK22vispancu:5731: śūrān vīrān kṛtotsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān ||Panc_4.43||
GK22vispancu:5732: atha tau dvāv api gṛhaṃ prāpya pitror agrato jyeṣṭha-bhrātṛ-ceṣṭitam ūcatuḥ-yathā gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrato 'pi naṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5733_0: so 'pi tad ākarṇya kopāviṣṭa-manāḥ prasphuritādhara-pallavas tāmralocanas triśikhāṃ
GK22vispancu:5733_1: bhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā tau nirbhartsayan paruṣatara-vacanāny uvāca-tataḥ siṃhyai kānte nītvā
GK22vispancu:5735: athāsau prabhūta-kopāviṣṭas tām uvāca-kim aham etābhyāṃ śauryeṇa rūpeṇa vidyābhyāsena kauśalena vā hīnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5738: tad ākarṇya siṃhī tasya jīvitam icchanty antar vihasya prāha-tat samyak śṛṇu |
GK22vispancu:5741: tad yāvad etau mat-putrau śiśutvāt tvāṃ śṛgālaṃ na jānītaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5742: tāvad drutataraṃ gatvā svajātīyānāṃ madhye bhava |
GK22vispancu:5743: no ced ābhyāṃ hato mṛtyu-pathaṃ sameṣyasi |
GK22vispancu:5744: so 'pi tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā bhaya-vyākula-manāḥ śanaiḥ śanair apasṛtya sva-jātyā militaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5745: tasmāt tvaṃ api yāvad ete rāja-putrās tvāṃ kulālaṃ najānanti, tāvad drutataram apasara |
GK22vispancu:5746: no ced eteṣāṃ sakāśād viḍambanāṃ prāpya mariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5749: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī (38) iti |
GK22vispancu:5750: dhiṅ mūrkha ! yat tvayā striyo 'rtha etat-kāryam anuṣṭhātum ārabdham |
GK22vispancu:5751: na hi strīṇāṃ kathañcid viśvāsam upagacchet | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5752: yad-arthe sva-kulaṃ tyaktaṃ jīvitārdhaṃ ca hāritam |
GK22vispancu:5753: sā māṃ tyajati niḥsnehā kaḥ strīṇāṃ viśvasen naraḥ ||Panc_4.44||
GK22vispancu:5760: so 'pi pratidinaṃ kuṭumbena saha kalahaṃ kurvāṇā na viśrāmyati |
GK22vispancu:5761: so 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ kalaham asahamāno bhāryā-vātsalyāt sva-kuṭumbaṃ parityajya brāhmaṇyā saha viprakṛṣṭaṃ deśāntaraṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5762: atha mahāṭavī-madhye brāhmaṇyābhihitaḥ-ārya-putra ! tṛṣṇā māṃ bādhate |
GK22vispancu:5764: athāsau tad-vacanānantaraṃ yāvad-udakaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchati tāvat tāṃ mṛtām apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:5765: ativallabhatayā viṣādaṃ kurvan yāvad vilapati tāvad ākāśe vācaṃ śṛṇoti |
GK22vispancu:5766: yathā hi-yadi brāhmaṇa tvaṃ svakīya-jīvitasyārdhaṃ dadāsi tatas te jīvati brāhmaṇī |
GK22vispancu:5767: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇena śucībhūya tisṛbhir vācobhiḥ svajīvitārdhaṃ dattam |
GK22vispancu:5768: vāk-samam eva ca brāhmaṇī jīvitā sā |
GK22vispancu:5769: atha tau jalaṃ pītvā vana-phalāni bhakṣayitvā gantum ārabdhau |
GK22vispancu:5770: tataḥ krameṇa kasyacin nagarasya pradeśe puṣpa-vāṭikāṃ praviśya brāhmaṇo bhāryām abhihitavān-bhadre,
GK22vispancu:5771: yāvad ahaṃ bhojanaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchāmi tāvad atra tvayā sthātavyam |

GK22vispancu:6021: tāḍitā api daṇḍena śastrair api vikhaṇḍitāḥ |

GK22vispancu:6023: āstāṃ tāvat kim anyena daurātmyeneha yoṣitām |
GK22vispancu:6024: vidhṛtaṃ svodareṇāpi ghnanti putram api svakam ||Panc_4.67||
GK22vispancu:6028: paraṃ kiṃ karomi ? mamānartha-dvayam etat sañjātam |
GK22vispancu:6031: athavā bhavaty evaṃ daiva-yogāt | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6032: yādṛśaṃ mama pāṇḍityaṃ tādṛśaṃ dviguṇaṃ tava |
GK22vispancu:6033: nābhūj jāro na bhartā ca kiṃ nirīkṣasi nagnike ||Panc_4.69||
GK22vispancu:6039: sā ca hālika-bhāryā patyur vṛddha-bhāvāt sadaivānya-cittā na kathañcid gṛhe sthairyam ālambate |
GK22vispancu:6041: atha kenacit para-vittāpahārakeṇa dhūrtena sā lakṣitā vijane proktā ca-subhage ! mṛta-bhāryo 'ham |
GK22vispancu:6044: tatas tayābhihitam-bhoḥ subhaga ! yady evaṃ tad asti me patyuḥ prabhūtaṃ dhanam |
GK22vispancu:6045: sa ca vṛddhatvāt pracalitum apy asamarthaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6047: yena tvayā sahānyatra gatvā yathecchayā rati-sukham anubhaviṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:6049: tat pratyūṣe'tra sthāne śīghram eva samāgantavyam,
GK22vispancu:6050: yena śubhataraṃ kiñcin nagaraṃ gatvā tvayā saha jīva-lokaḥ saphalīkriyate |
GK22vispancu:6051: sāpi tatheti pratijñāya prahasita-vadanā sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā rātrau prasupte bhartari sarvaṃ vittam ādāya pratyūṣa-samaye tat-kathita-sthānam upādravat |
GK22vispancu:6052: dhūrto 'pi tām agre vidhāya dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritya satvara-gatiḥ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6053: evaṃ tayor vrajator yojana-dvaya-mātreṇāgrataḥ kācin nadī samupasthitā |
GK22vispancu:6054: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūrtaś cintayāmāsa-kim aham anayā yauvana-prānte vartamānayā kariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:6055: kiṃ ca kadāpy asyāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ ko 'pi sameṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6057: tat kevalam asyā vittam ādāya gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:6058: iti niścitya tām uvāca-priye ! sudustareyaṃ mahānadā |
GK22vispancu:6059: tad ahaṃ dravya-mātrāṃ pāre dhṛtvā samāgacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:6060: tatas tvām ekākinīṃ sva-pṛṣṭham āropya sukhenottārayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:6061: sā prāha-subhaga ! evaṃ kriyatām | ity uktvāśiṣaṃ vittaṃ tasmai samarpayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:6064: tathānuṣṭhite dhūrto vittaṃ vastra-yugalaṃ cādāya yathācintita-viṣayaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6065: sāpi kaṇṭha-niveśita-hasta-yugalā sodvegā nadī-pulina-deśa upaviṣṭā yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad etasminn antare kācic chṛgālikā māṃsa-piṇḍa-gṛhīta-vadanā tatrājagāma |
GK22vispancu:6066: āgatya ca yāvat paśyati, tāvan nadī mahān matsyaḥ salilān niṣkramya bahiḥ sthita āste |
GK22vispancu:6067: evaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sā māṃsa-piṇḍaṃ samutsṛjya taṃ matsyaṃ pratyupādravat |
GK22vispancu:6069: atrāntaram ākāśād avatīrya ko 'pi gṛdhras taṃ māṃsa-piṇḍam ādāya punaḥ kham utpatāta |
GK22vispancu:6072: sā śṛgālikā vyartha-śramā gṛdhram avalokayantī tayā nagnikayā sa-smitam abhihitā-
GK22vispancu:6075: mitraṃ hy amitratāṃ yātam aparaṃ me priyā mitrā |
GK22vispancu:6076: gṛham anyena ca vyāptaṃ kim adyāpi bhaviṣyati ||Panc_4.71||
GK22vispancu:6078: kṣate prahārā nipatanty abhīkṣṇam anna-kṣaye vardhati jāṭharāgniḥ |
GK22vispancu:6079: āpatsu vairāṇi samudbhavanti vāme vidhau sarvam idaṃ narāṇām ||Panc_4.72||
GK22vispancu:6082: kiṃ vā sāmnaiva sambodhya gṛhān niḥsārayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:6083: kiṃ vā bhedaṃ dānaṃ vā karomi ?
GK22vispancu:6084: athavāmum eva vānara-mitraṃ pṛcchāmi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6085: yaḥ pṛṣṭvā kurute kāryaṃ praṣṭavyān sva-hitān gurūn |
GK22vispancu:6086: na tasya jāyate vighnaḥ kasmiṃścid api karmaṇi ||Panc_4.73||
GK22vispancu:6087: evaṃ sampradhārya bhūyo 'pi tam eva jambū-vṛkṣam ārūḍhaṃ kapim apṛcchat-bho mitra ! paśya me manda-bhāgyatām |
GK22vispancu:6088: tat samprati gṛham api me balavattareṇa makareṇa ruddham |
GK22vispancu:6090: kathaya kiṃ karomi ? sāmādīnām upāyānāṃ madhye kasyātra viṣayaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6091: sa āha-bhoḥ kṛtaghna pāpa-cārin ! mayā niṣiddho 'pi kiṃ bhūyo mām anusarasi |
GK22vispancu:6093: tac chrutvā makaraḥ prāha-bho mitra ! sāparādhasya me pūrva-sneham anusmṛtya hitopadeśaṃ dehi |
GK22vispancu:6095: yad bhāryā-vākyena bhavatāhaṃ samudre prakṣiptuṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6097: yadyapi bhāryā sarva-lokād api vallabhā bhavati,
GK22vispancu:6098: tathāpi na mitrāṇi bāndhavāś ca bhāryā-vākyena samudre prakṣipyante |
GK22vispancu:6099: tan mūrkha ! mūḍhatvena nāśas tava mayā prāg eva nivedita āsīt, yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6100: satāṃ vacanam ādiṣṭaṃ madena na karoti yaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6101: sa vināśam avāpnoti ghaṇṭoṣṭra iva satvaram ||Panc_4.74||
GK22vispancu:6106: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne ujjvalako nāma rathakāraḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:6107: sa cātīva dāridryopahataś cintitavān-aho ! dhig iyaṃ daridratāsmad-gṛhe |
GK22vispancu:6108: yataḥ sarvo 'pi janaḥ sva-karmaṇaiva ratas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:6110: yataḥ sarva-lokānāṃ cirantanāś caturbhūmikā gṛhāḥ santi |
GK22vispancu:6112: tat kiṃ madīyena rathakāratvena prayojanam ? iti cintayitvā deśān niṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6113: yāvat kiñcid vanaṃ gacchati tāvad gahvarākāra-vana-gahana-madhye sūryāstam anavelāyāṃ sva-yūthād bhraṣṭāṃ prasava-vedanayā pīḍyamānām uṣṭrīm apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:6114: sa ca dāseraka-yuktām uṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-sthānābhimukhaḥ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6115: gṛham āsādya rajjuṃ gṛhītvā tām uṣṭrikāṃ babandha |
GK22vispancu:6116: tataś ca tīkṣṇaṃ paraśum ādāya tasyāḥ pallavānayanārthaṃ parvataika-deśe gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6117: tatra ca nūtanāni komalāni bahūni pallavāni cchittvā śirasi samāropya tasyāgre nicikṣepa |
GK22vispancu:6118: tayā ca tāni śanaiḥ śanair bhakṣitāni |
GK22vispancu:6119: paścāt pallava-bhakṣaṇa-prabhāvād aharniśaṃ pīvara-tanur uṣṭrī sañjātā |
GK22vispancu:6121: tataḥ sa nityam eva dugdhaṃ gṛhītvā sva-kuṭumbaṃ paripālayati |
GK22vispancu:6122: atha rathakāreṇa vallabhatvād dāseraka-grīvāyāṃ mahatī ghaṇṭā pratibaddhā |
GK22vispancu:6123: paścād rathakāro vyacintayat-aho ! kim anyair duṣkṛta-karmabhiḥ |
GK22vispancu:6124: yāvan mamaitasmād evoṣṭrāparipālanād asya kuṭumbasya bhavyaṃ sañjātam |
GK22vispancu:6126: evaṃ vicintya gṛham āgatya priyām āha-bhadre ! samīcīno 'yaṃ vyāpāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:6127: tava sammatiś cet kuto 'pi dhanikāt kiñcid dravyam ādāya mayā gurjara-deśe gantavyaṃ kalabha-grahaṇāya |
GK22vispancu:6129: yāvad aham aparām uṣṭrīṃ nītvā samāgacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:6130: tataś ca gurjara-deśaṃ gatvoṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-gṛham āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6131: kiṃ bahunā ? tena tathā kṛtaṃ yathā tasya pracurā uṣṭrāḥ karabhāś ca sammilitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:6132: tatas tena mahad uṣṭra-yūthaṃ kṛtvā rakṣā-puruṣo dhṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6133: tasya prativarṣaṃ vṛttyā karabham ekaṃ prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:6134: prativarṣam anyac cāharniśaṃ dugdha-pānaṃ tasya nirūpitam |
GK22vispancu:6135: evaṃ rathakāro 'pi nityam evoṣṭrī-karabha-vyāpāraṃ kurvan sukhena tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:6137: komala-vallīr yathecchayā bhakṣayitvā mahati sarasi pānīyaṃ pītvā sāyantana-samaye mandaṃ mandaṃ līlayā gṛham āgacchanti |
GK22vispancu:6138: sa ca pūrva-dāserako madātirekāt pṛṣṭha āgatya milati |
GK22vispancu:6139: tatas taiḥ kalabhair abhihitam-aho ! manda-matir ayaṃ dāserako yathā yūthād bhraṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhe sthitvā ghaṇṭāṃ vādayann āgacchati |
GK22vispancu:6140: yadi kasyāpi duṣṭa-sattvasya mukhe patiṣyati, tan nūnaṃ mṛtyum avāpsyati |
GK22vispancu:6141: atha tasya tad-vanaṃ gāhamānasya kaścit siṃho ghaṇṭā-ravam ākarṇya samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6142: yāvad avalokayati, tāvad uṣṭrī-dāserakāṇāṃ yūthaṃ gacchati |
GK22vispancu:6143: ekas tu punaḥ pṛṣṭhe krīḍāṃ kurvan vallarīś caran yāvat tiṣṭhati,
GK22vispancu:6144: tāvad anye dāserakāḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā sva-gṛhe gatāḥ |
GK22vispancu:6145: so 'pi vanān niṣkramya yāvad diśo 'valokayati, tāvan na kañcin mārgaṃ paśyati vetti ca |
GK22vispancu:6146: yūthād bhraṣṭo mandaṃ mandaṃ bṛhac-chabdaṃ kurvan yāvat kiyad-dūraṃ gacchati,
GK22vispancu:6147: tāvat tac-chabdānusārī siṃho 'pi kramaṃ kṛtvā nibhṛto 'yaṃ vyavasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6148: tato yāvad uṣṭraḥ samīpam āgataḥ, tāvat siṃhena lambhayitvā grīvāyāṃ gṛhīto māritaś ca |
GK22vispancu:6153: parasminn iha loke ca vyasanaṃ nopapadyate ||Panc_4.75||
GK22vispancu:6154: tata sarvathā kṛtaghnasyāpi me kuru prasādam upadeśa-pradānena | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6155: upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhutve tasya ko guṇaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6156: apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sa sādhuḥ sadbhir ucyate ||Panc_4.76||
GK22vispancu:6157: tad ākarṇya vānaraḥ prāha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tarhi tatra gatvā tena saha yuddhaṃ kuru | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6158: hatas tvaṃ prāpsyasi svargaṃ jīvan gṛham atho yaśaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6166: āsīt kasmiṃścid deśe mahā-caturako nāma śṛgālaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6167: tena kadācid araṇye svayaṃ mṛto gajaḥ samāsāditaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6168: tasya samantāt paribhramati, paraṃ kaṭhināṃ tvacaṃ bhettuṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:6169: athātrāvasara itaś cetaś ca vicaran kaścit siṃhas tatraiva pradeśe samāyayau |
GK22vispancu:6170: atha siṃhaṃ samāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa kṣiti-tala-vinyasta-mauli-maṇḍalaḥ saṃyojita-kara-yugalaḥ sa-vinayam uvāca-svāmin ! tvadīyo 'haṃ lāguḍikaḥ sthitas tvad-arthe gajam imaṃ rakṣāmi |
GK22vispancu:6172: taṃ praṇataṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhaḥ prāha-bhoḥ ! nāham anyena hataṃ sattvaṃ kadācid api bhakṣayāmi |
GK22vispancu:6174: tac chrutvā śṛgālaḥ sānandam āha-yuktam idaṃ svāmino nija-bhṛtyeṣu | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6175: antyāvastho 'pi mahān svāmi-guṇān na jahāti śuddhatayā |
GK22vispancu:6177: atha siṃhe gate kaścid vyāghraḥ samāyayau |
GK22vispancu:6178: tam api dṛṣṭvāsau vyacintayat-aho ! ekas tāvad durātmā praṇipātenāpavāhitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6179: tat katham idānīm enam apavāhayiṣyāmi ? nūnaṃ śūro 'yam |
GK22vispancu:6180: na khalu bhedaṃ vinā sādhyo bhaviṣyati | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6181: na yatra śakyate kartuṃ sāma dānam athāpi vā |
GK22vispancu:6182: bhedas tatra prayoktavyo yataḥ sa vaśa-kārakaḥ ||Panc_4.80||
GK22vispancu:6183: kiṃ ca sarva-guṇa-sampanno 'pi bhedena badhyate | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6186: evaṃ sampradhārya tasyābhimukho bhūtvā garvād unnata-kandharaḥ sa-sambhramam uvāca-māma ! katham atra bhavān mṛtyu-mukhe praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6188: sa ca mām etad rakṣaṇaṃ niyujya nadyāṃ snānārthaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6189: tena ca gacchatā mama samādiṣṭam-yadi kaścid iha vyāghraḥ samāyāti, tvayā suguptaṃ mām āvedanīyam |
GK22vispancu:6190: yena vanam idaṃ mayā nirvyāghraṃ kartavyam |
GK22vispancu:6191: yataḥ pūrvaṃ vyāghreṇaikena mayā vyāpādito gajaḥ śūnye bhakṣayitvocchiṣṭatāṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6193: tac chrutvā vyāghraḥ santrastam āha-bho bhāgineya ! dehi me prāṇa-dakṣiṇām |
GK22vispancu:6194: tvayā tasyātra cirāyāyātasyāpi madīyā kāpi vārtā nākhyeyā |
GK22vispancu:6196: atha gate vyāghre tatra kaścid dvīpī samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6198: tad asya pārśvād asya gajasya yathā carma-cchedo bhavati tathā karomi |
GK22vispancu:6199: evaṃ niścitya tam apy uvāca-bho bhaginī-suta ! kim iti cirād dṛṣṭo 'si |
GK22vispancu:6200: kathaṃ ca bubhukṣita iva lakṣyase ? tad atithir asi me |
GK22vispancu:6203: paraṃ tathāpi yāvat siṃho na samāyāti,
GK22vispancu:6204: tāvad asya gajasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā tṛptiṃ kṛtvā drutataraṃ vraja |
GK22vispancu:6205: sa āha-māma, tad evaṃ tan na kāryaṃ me māṃsāśanena, yato jīvan naro bhadra-śatāni paśyati |
GK22vispancu:6206: uktaṃ ca-yac chakyaṃ grasitaṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat (23) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:6207: tat sarvathā tad eva bhujyate yad eva pariṇamati |
GK22vispancu:6209: śṛgāla āha-bho adhīra ! viśrabdho bhūtvā bhakṣaya tvam |
GK22vispancu:6211: tathānuṣṭhite dīvpinā bhinnāṃ tvacaṃ vijñāya jambūkenābhihitam-bho bhaginī-suta ! gamyatām |
GK22vispancu:6214: atha yāvad asau tad-bheda-kṛta-dvāreṇa kiñcin māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati,
GK22vispancu:6216: atha tam ātma-tulya-parākramaṃ dṛṣṭvā-uttamaṃ praṇipātena śūraṃ bhedena yojayet (78)
GK22vispancu:6217: iti ślokaṃ paṭhan tad-abhimukha-kṛta-prayāṇaḥ sva-daṃṣṭrābhis taṃ vidārya diśo bhāgaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ sukhena cira-kālaṃ hasti-māṃsaṃ bubhuje |
GK22vispancu:6218: evaṃ tvam api taṃ ripuṃ sva-jātīyaṃ yuddhena paribhūya diśo-bhāgaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:6219: no cet paścād baddha-mūlād asmāt tvam api vināśam avāpsyasi | uktaṃ ca yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6220: sambhāvyaṃ goṣu sampannaṃ sambhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6221: sambhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ sambhāvyaṃ jātito bhayam ||Panc_4.82||
GK22vispancu:6224: eko doṣo videśasya svajātir yad virudhyate ||Panc_4.83||
GK22vispancu:6229: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne citrāṅgo nāma sārameyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6232: atha citrāṅgaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhas tad-bhayād deśāntaraṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6233: tatra ca kasmiṃścit pure kasyacid gṛha-medhino gṛhiṇyāḥ prasādena pratidinaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśya vividhānnāni bhakṣayan parāṃ tṛptiṃ gacchati |
GK22vispancu:6234: paraṃ tad-gṛhād bahir niṣkrānto 'nyair madoddhata-sārameyaiḥ sarva-dikṣu parivṛtya sarvāṅgaṃ daṃṣṭrābhir vidāryate |
GK22vispancu:6235: tatas tena vicintitavān-aho ! varaṃ sva-deśo yatra durbhikṣe'pi sukhena sthīyate |
GK22vispancu:6237: tad evaṃ sva-nagaraṃ vrajāmi ity avadhārya sva-sthānaṃ prati jagāma |
GK22vispancu:6238: athāsau deśāntarāt samāyātaḥ sarvair api svajanaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoś citrāṅga ! kathayāsmākaṃ deśāntara-vārtām |
GK22vispancu:6239: kīdṛg deśaḥ ? kiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ lokasya ? ka āhāraḥ ? kaś ca vyavahāras tatra iti |
GK22vispancu:6241: subhikṣāṇi vicitrāṇi śithilāḥ paura-yoṣitaḥ (83) iti paṭhati |

GK22vispancu:6983: rākṣaso 'pi taṃ tathā-bhūtam avalokya ślokam enam apaṭhat-
GK22vispancu:6985: vikālena gṛhīto 'si yaḥ paraiti sa jīvati ||Panc_5.84||
GK22vispancu:6987: tat preṣaya māṃ yena gṛhaṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:6988: tvaṃ punar anubhuṅkṣvātra sthita eva lobha-vṛkṣa-phalam |
GK22vispancu:6989: cakradhara āha-bhoḥ akāraṇam etat | daiva-vaśāt sampadyate nṛṇāṃ śubhāśubham | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6996: trayo 'py anyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite ||Panc_5.86||
GK22vispancu:7001: asty atra dharā-tala uttarā-pathe madhu-puraṃ nāma nagaram |
GK22vispancu:7003: tasya kadācid viṣaya-sukham anubhavatas tristanī kanyā babhūva |
GK22vispancu:7004: atha tāṃ trastanīṃ jātāṃ śrutvā sa rājā kañcukinaḥ provāca,
GK22vispancu:7005: yad-bhos tyajyatām iyaṃ trastanī gatvā dūre'raṇye yathā kaścin na jānāti |
GK22vispancu:7006: tac chrutvā kañcukinaḥ procuḥ-mahārāja jñāyate yad aniṣṭa-kāriṇī tristanī kanyā bhavati |
GK22vispancu:7007: tathāpi brāhmaṇam āhūya praṣṭavyāḥ, yena loka-dvayaṃ na virudhyate, yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:7008: yaḥ satataṃ paripṛcchati śṛṇoti sandhārayaty aniśam |
GK22vispancu:7017: deva ! kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe caṇḍakarmā nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:7018: ekadā tena bhramatāṭavyāṃ kaścid brāhmaṇaḥ samāsāditaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7019: tatas tasya skandham āruhya provāca-bho agresaro gamyatām |
GK22vispancu:7021: atha tasya kamalodara-komalau pādau dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇo rākṣasam apṛcchat-bhoḥ ! kim evaṃ-vidhau te pādāv atikomalau ?
GK22vispancu:7022: rākṣasa āha-bhoḥ ! vratam asti, nāham ārdra-pādo bhūmiṃ spṛśāmi |
GK22vispancu:7023: tatas tac chrutvātmano mokṣopāyaṃ cintayaṃs tat-saraḥ prāptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7024: tato rākṣasenābhihitaṃ-bhoḥ ! yāvad ahaṃ snānaṃ kṛtvā devatārcana-vidhiṃ vidhāyāgacchāmi tāvat tvayātaḥ sthānād anyatra na gantavyam |
GK22vispancu:7025: tathānuṣṭhite divjaś cintayāmāsa-nūnaṃ devatārcana-vidher ūrdhvaṃ mām eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:7026: tad drutataraṃ gacchāmi, yenaiṣa ārdra-pādo na mama pṛṣṭham eṣyati |
GK22vispancu:7027: tathānuṣṭhite rākṣaso vrata-bhaṅga-bhayāt tasya pṛṣṭhaṃ na gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:7029: atha tebhyas tac chrutvā-rājā dvijān āhūya provāca-bho brāhmaṇāḥ ! tristanī me kanyā samutpannā,
GK22vispancu:7030: tat kiṃ tasyāḥ pratividhānam asti, na vā ?
GK22vispancu:7031: hīnāṅgī vādhikāṅgī vā yā bhavet kanyakā nṛṇām |
GK22vispancu:7032: bhartuḥ syāt sā vināśāya sva-śīla-nidhanāya ca ||Panc_5.89||
GK22vispancu:7033: yā punas tristanī kanyā yāti locana-gocaram |
GK22vispancu:7034: pitaraṃ nāśaty eva sā drutaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_5.90||
GK22vispancu:7036: tathā yadi kaścid udvāhayati, tad enāṃ tasmai dattvā, deśa-tyāgena sa niyojayitavyaḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:7038: atha teṣāṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa rājā paṭaha-śabdena sarvatra ghoṣaṇām ājñāpayāmāsa-aho ! tristanīṃ rājakanyāṃ yaḥ kaścid udvāhayati sa suvarṇa-lakṣam āpnoti deśa-tyāgaṃ ca |
GK22vispancu:7039: evaṃ tasyām āghoṣaṇāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ mahān kālo vyatītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7041: sāpi yauvanonmukhī sañjātā sugupta-sthāna-sthitā yatnena rakṣyamāṇā tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:7042: atra tatraiva nagare kaścid andhas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:7044: tābhyāṃ taṃ paṭaha-śabdam ākarṇya, mitho mantritaṃ-spṛśyate'yaṃ paṭahaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7045: yadi katham api daivāt kanyā labhyate |
GK22vispancu:7046: suvarṇa-prāptiś ca bhavati, tathā sukhena suvarṇa-prāptyā kālo vrajati |
GK22vispancu:7047: atha yadi tasya doṣato mṛtyur bhavati |
GK22vispancu:7048: tadā dāridryopāttasyāsya kleśasya paryanto bhavati | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7053: evam uktvāndhena gatvā, sa paṭahaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7054: uktaṃ ca-bhoḥ ! ahaṃ tāṃ kanyām udvāhayāmi, yadi rājā me prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:7055: tatas tai rāja-puruṣair gatvā rājñe niveditam-deva ! andhena kenacit paṭahaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7058: andho vā vadhiro vātha kuṣṭī vāpy antyajo 'pi vā |
GK22vispancu:7059: parigṛhṇātu tāṃ kanyāṃ sa-lakṣāṃ syād videśagaḥ ||Panc_5.92||
GK22vispancu:7060: atha rājādeśāt tai rāja-puruṣais taṃ nadī-tīre nītvā suvarṇa-lakṣeṇa samaṃ vivāha-vidhinā tristanīṃ tasmai dattvā,
GK22vispancu:7061: jala-yāne nidhāya kaivartāḥ proktāḥ-bho ! deśāntaraṃ nītvā kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne'ndhaḥ sapatnīkaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7063: tathānuṣṭhite videśam āsādya kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaivarta-darśite trayo 'pi mūlyena gṛhaṃ prāptāḥ sukhena kālaṃ nayanti sma |
GK22vispancu:7064: kevalam andhaḥ paryaṅke suptas tiṣṭhati, gṛha-vyāpāraṃ mantharakaḥ karoti |
GK22vispancu:7065: evaṃ gacchatā kālena tristanyā kubjakena saha vikṛtiḥ samapadyata |
GK22vispancu:7067: yadi syāc chrī-talo vahniś candramā dahanātmakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7068: susvādaḥ sāgaraḥ strīṇāṃ tat-satīs tvaṃ prajāyate ||Panc_5.93||
GK22vispancu:7069: athānyedyus tristanyā mantharako 'bhihitaḥ-bhoḥ subhaga ! yady eṣo 'ndhaḥ kathañcit vyāpādyate,
GK22vispancu:7071: tad anviṣyatāṃ kutracid viṣam, yenāsmai tat pradāya sukhinī bhavāmi |
GK22vispancu:7072: anyadā kubjakena paribhramatā mṛtaḥ kṛṣṇasarpaḥ prāptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7073: taṃ gṛhītvā prahṛṣṭa-manā gṛham abhyetya tām āha-subhage ! labdho 'yaṃ kṛṣṇa-sarpaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7074: tad enaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā prabhūta-śuṇṭhy-ādibhiḥ saṃskāryāsmai vikala-netrāya matsyāmiṣaṃ bhaṇitvā prayaccha yena drāg vinaśyati |
GK22vispancu:7077: sāpi pradīpte vahnau kṛṣṇa-sarpaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā takra-sthālyām ādhāya gṛha-vyāpārākulā taṃ vikalākṣaṃ sa-praśrayam uvāca-ārya-putra ! tavābhīṣṭaṃ matsya-māṃsaṃ samānītam |
GK22vispancu:7079: te ca matsyā vahnau pāvanāya tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:7080: tad yāvad ahaṃ gṛha-kṛtyaṃ karomi, tāvat tvaṃ darvīm ādāya kṣaṇam ekaṃ tān pracālaya |
GK22vispancu:7081: so 'pi tad ākarṇya hṛṣṭa-manāḥ sṛkkaṇī parilihan drutam utthāya darvīm ādāya pramathitum ārabdhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7082: atha tasya matsyān mathnato viṣa-garbha-bāṣpeṇa saṃspṛṣṭaṃ nīla-paṭalaṃ cakṣurbhyām agalat |
GK22vispancu:7083: asāv apy andhas taṃ bahu-guṇaṃ manyamāno viśeṣān netrābhyāṃ bāṣpa-grahaṇam akarot |
GK22vispancu:7086: tato vyacintayat-aho, kim etat ? mama matsyāmiṣaṃ kathitam āsīd anayā |
GK22vispancu:7088: tat tāvad vijānāmi samyak tristanyāś ceṣṭitam |
GK22vispancu:7091: evaṃ vicintya svākāraṃ gūhayann andhavat karma karoti yathā purā |
GK22vispancu:7092: atrāntare kubjaḥ samāgatya niḥśaṅkatayāliṅgana-cumbanādibhis tristanīṃ sevitum upacakrame |
GK22vispancu:7093: so 'py andhas tam avalokayann api yāvan na kiñcic chastraṃ paśyati,
GK22vispancu:7094: tāvat kopa-vyākula-manāḥ pūrvavac chayanaṃ gatvā kubjaṃ caraṇābhyāṃ saṅgṛhya sāmarthyāt sva-mastakopari bhrāmayitvā tristanīṃ hṛdaye vyatāḍayat |
GK22vispancu:7095: atha kubja-prahāreṇa tasyās tṛtīyaḥ stana urasi praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7096: tathā balān mastakopari bhramaṇena kubjaḥ prāñjalatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:7103: atha evam eva yo vartate, sa tvam iva vinaśyati | tathā ca-
GK22vispancu:7110: kasmiṃścit sarovare bhāruṇḍa-nāmā pakṣī ekodaraḥ pṛthag-grīvaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:7111: tena ca samudra-tīre paribhramatā kañcit phalam amṛta-kalpaṃ taraṅga-kṣiptaṃ samprāptam |
GK22vispancu:7112: so 'pi bhakṣayann idam āha-aho ! bahūni mayāmṛta-prāyāṇi samudra-kallolāhṛtāni phalāni bhakṣitāni |
GK22vispancu:7115: kiṃ vā, kiñcid amṛta-maya-phalam idam avyaktenāpi vidhināpātitam |
GK22vispancu:7117: yady evaṃ tan mamāpi stokaṃ prayaccha,
GK22vispancu:7119: tato vihasya prathama-vaktreṇābhihitam-āvayos tāvad ekam udaram |
GK22vispancu:7121: tataḥ kiṃ pṛthag bhakṣitena ? varam anena śeṣeṇa priyā toṣyate |
GK22vispancu:7122: evam abhidhāya tena śeṣaṃ bhāruṇḍyāḥ pradattam |
GK22vispancu:7124: dvitīyaṃ mukhaṃ tad-dinād eva prabhṛti sodvegaṃ sa-viṣādaṃ ca tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:7126: tad dṛṣṭvāparam āha-bho nistriṃśa ! puruṣādhama ! nirapekṣa ! mayā viṣa-phalam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:7129: evaṃ kṛte dvayor api vināśo bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:7130: athaivaṃ vadatā tenāpamānena tat phalaṃ bhakṣitam |
GK22vispancu:7134: cakradhara āha-satyam etat | tad gaccha gṛham | param ekākinā na gantavyam | uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7135: ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaś cārthān na cintayet |
GK22vispancu:7136: eko na gacched adhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt ||Panc_5.95||
GK22vispancu:7144: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne brahmadatta-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:7145: sa ca prayojana-vaśād grāmaṃ prasthitaḥ sva-mātrābhihitaḥ, yad-vatsa ! katham ekākī vrajasi ?
GK22vispancu:7147: sa āha-amba ! mā bhaiṣīḥ | nirupadravo 'yaṃ mārgaḥ | kārya-vaśād ekākī gamiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:7148: atha tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā samīpastha-vāpyāḥ sakāśāt karkaṭam ādāya mātrābhihitaṃ-vatsa,
GK22vispancu:7152: so 'pi mātur vacanād ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ na saṅgṛhya karpūra-puṭikā-madhye nidhāya,
GK22vispancu:7154: atha gacchan grīṣmoṣmaṇā santaptaḥ kañcin mārgasthaṃ vṛkṣam āsādya, tatraiva prasuptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7155: atrāntare vṛkṣa-koṭarān nirgatya sarpas tat-samīpam āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:7157: so 'pi karkaṭas tatraiva sthitaḥ san sarpa-prāṇān apāharata |
GK22vispancu:7159: tāvat samīpe mṛta-kṛṣṇa-sarpo nija-pārśve karpūra-puṭikopari sthitas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:7161: prasanno bhūtvābravīc ca-bhoḥ ! satyam abhihitaṃ mama mātrā yat puruṣeṇa ko 'pi sahāyaḥ kāryaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7163: yato mayā śraddhā-pūrita-cetasā tad-vacanam anuṣṭhitaṃ tenāhaṃ karkaṭena sarva-vyāpādanād rakṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7165: kṣīṇaḥ śrayati śaśī ravim ṛddho vardhayati payasāṃ nātham |
GK22vispancu:7166: anye vipadi sahāyā dhanināṃ śriyam anubhavanty anye ||Panc_5.97||
GK22vispancu:7167: mantre tīrthe dvije deve daivajñe bheṣaje gurau |
GK22vispancu:7168: yādṛśī bhāvanā yasya siddhir bhavati tādṛśī ||Panc_5.98||
GK22vispancu:7169: evam śrutvā suvarṇasiddhis tam anujñāpya svagṛhaṃ prati nivṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7173:  yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tvaṃ darśaya taṃ caurasiṃhaṃ yathā vyāpādayāmi |
